4.1 Wish Express 暂停资格政策.source_string: 4.1 Suspension Policy for Wish Express Orders

4.1.1 我们每周（周一到周日）依据“暂停资格政策”对 Wish Expres.source_string: 4.1.1 The Suspension Policy measures Wish Express orders weekly, from Monday through Sunday.

4.1.2 如果某账户在最近一个考核周期内发往某目的地国家/地区的 Wish E.source_string: 4.1.2 A merchant account will be suspended from Wish Express in the destination countries where its On-Time Arrival Rate is under 90% and/or the Pre-Fulfillment Cancellation Rate is ≥ 10% for the most recent measurement period. In both situations, merchants will receive an infraction warning on the suspension. Merchants may file disputes in response to the suspension within 11 calendar days from receiving the infraction details.

4.1.3 如果商户账户曾根据“暂停资格政策”而被暂停美国路向的 Wish Ex.source_string: 4.1.3 If a merchant account has previously been suspended three times by the Suspension Policy for U.S. Wish Express, or five times for non-U.S. Wish Express, the merchant account will be permanently removed from Wish Express in the corresponding country/countries.

4.1.4 该政策按国家/地区维度考核订单。 商户可以分别申请及/或被暂停 Wi.source_string: 4.1.4 The policy will be executed on a per-country level. Merchants will apply to and/or be suspended for each Wish Express destination country individually.

4.2.1 如果 Wish Express 订单在规定妥投时间之后的5个工作日内.source_string: 4.2.1 All Wish Express orders that are not confirmed delivered by carriers before the end of the fifth working day after the on-time delivery requirement from order released date will not be eligible for payment.

4.2.2 Wish 每周（周一到周日）依据“赔款政策”对 Wish Expre.source_string: 4.2.2 The Penalties Policy measures Wish Express orders weekly, from Monday through Sunday. Late delivery orders will be penalized by {%1=Example: 20%} of the order value or {%2=Format Currency}, whichever is greater. For confirmed shipped US orders, a flat exemption of {%3=Example: 1%} Wish Express Total Order Value will be applied. For the confirmed shipped orders to the rest of the countries, a flat exemption of {%4=Example: 2%} of Wish Express Total Order Value will be applied and calculated on a per-country basis. Merchants will be subject to Late Confirmed Fulfillment Policy 5.5 and penalized for all orders not confirmed shipped by carrier within 168 hours. Note that this policy is only applicable to confirmed fulfilled orders where the merchant price per item plus the shipping price per item is less than {%5=Format Currency}; the penalty is reversible upon confirmed delivery by the carrier within required Wish Express delivery time frame. For Pre-Fulfillment Cancellations, merchants will also be penalized {%6=Format Currency} per auto-refunded order not fulfilled within {%7=A number, e.g. 5} calendar days, and {%8=Format Currency} per violating order for merchant-initiated cancellation and/or refunds prior to fulfillment due to merchant’s inability to fulfill for any reason, per Wish Fulfillment Policy.

4.2.3 商户可在收到赔款详情后的{%1=A number, e.g. 11}.source_string: 4.2.3 Merchants may file disputes for non-compliant orders within {%1=A number, e.g. 11} calendar days from receiving the Penalty details, with the exception that the penalties for [Late Confirmed Fulfillment Policy 5.5](/policy/fulfillment#5.5), which can only be disputed and approved within {%2=A number, e.g. 90} days from when the penalty was created.

4.2.4 如果订单在订单释放之日起下一个工作日的UTC时间23:59:59之前.source_string: 4.2.4 Orders confirmed fulfilled by 23:59:59 UTC of the next working day from order released date, and fulfilled through specific qualified carriers, will be excluded from the penalty. Specific qualified carriers that will be excluded from the penalty include:

4.3.1 如果某个 Wish Express 订单违反妥投要求并被退款，无论是.source_string: 4.3.1 If a Wish Express order violates the Wish Express Delivery Requirement and is refunded for any reason, the merchant is responsible for 100% of the cost of a refund on that order. Cookie 和相关技术 - 我们和其他人可能会使用 Cookie（Cookie.source_string: Cookies and Related Technologies - We and others may use cookies, which are text files containing small amounts of information that are downloaded on your device, or related technologies, such as web beacons, local shared objects and tracking pixels to store or collect information ("Cookies"). Cookies can help us and others learn about your online activity including on other sites or services. For example, web beacons allow ad networks to provide aggregated auditing, research and reporting for us and for advertisers. Web beacons also enable ad networks to serve targeted advertisements to you when you visit other websites. Because your web browser must request these advertisements and web beacons from the ad network's servers, these companies can view, edit, or set their own cookies, just as if you had requested a web page from their site.

Webhook 事件通知会在事件发生后立即发送给您，因此，您的应用可以快速将更改.source_string: Webhook event notifications are sent to you immediately after events occur, so your app can push changes to merchants quickly. Let’s say a customer cancels an order around the same time that a merchant is about to ship the ordered item. If your app is set up via webhook to receive notifications upon order cancellation, your app can inform the merchant of the order cancellation via automated phone call or SMS, allowing the merchant to avoid sending the item.

Webhook 是一款实用性工具，支持应用实时接收商户店铺中发生的特定事件的通知.source_string: Webhooks are a useful tool that allow apps to receive real-time notifications for particular events that occur to a merchant’s store. These events can include a customer placing an order, or a merchant creating a new product.

Webhook 有助于减少 API 调用次数并节约计算资源。您可以在收到 Web.source_string: Webhooks can reduce your API calls and save computing resources. Instead of pulling resources periodically and comparing what has been updated, you can trigger actions in your app upon receiving webhooks events.

Webhook 消息的架构需与我们的 V3 RESTful API 架构保持一致.source_string: The schema of the webhook message is consistent with our V3 RESTful API schema so that you can reuse the logic of RESTful APIs to process the pushed events.

You represent and warrant that you are at least 18 years old and that all registration information you submit is accurate and truthful. Wish may, in its sole discretion, refuse to offer access to or use of the Service to any person or entity or change its eligibility criteria at any time. This provision is void where prohibited by law and the right to access the Service is revoked in such jurisdictions.

Wish 的根本宗旨是平等对待每一位 Wish 商户。 但是，Wish 可能会因.source_string: Wish generally aims for equal treatment of the Wish merchants. However, Wish might differentiate merchants for the following reasons: (i) products offered by Wish merchants that participate in the paid ProductBoost service might be privileged due to economic and commercial reasons; (ii) products offered by merchants with high ratings may be favored over those merchants with lower ratings; (iii) products offered by merchants with low refund rates may be favored over those merchants with higher refund rates; (iv) products offered in regions in close proximity to a Wish customer may be favored over products offered outside those regions; (v) products offered by Wish or its affiliated companies might be privileged for economic and commercial reasons; and (vi) products whose merchants offer faster shipping options may be favored over products whose merchants offer slower shipping options. Privileged treatment may include higher position in rankings; increased direct or indirect remuneration to the merchant for use of the Services; or increased ability to offer products to specific users.

Wish 禁止通过修改详情页将现有产品篡改为新产品。 违反此政策的商户将面临违规.source_string: Changing an existing product listing into a new product and new product listing is prohibited on Wish. Merchants that violate this policy face the risk of an infraction warning and negative impacts to the merchant’s Wish Standards tier. Repeat violations may result in suspension or termination from Wish.

Wish 禁止销售仿造和/或仿真的贵金属块/条。此产品将无法重新上架。.source_string: Counterfeit and/or replica bullion is prohibited on Wish. This product may not be relisted.

Wish 禁止销售推广、宣传、暗示和/或描绘具有特定功效但缺乏充足证据的保健产品.source_string: Products or listings which advertise, promote, allude to, and/or depict any results for health and health-related, or personal care products without adequate substantiation are not permitted on Wish. If such content is removed, the listing may be reactivated.

Wish 禁止销售设备功能/规格描述虚假、夸张、不合理或无法实现的产品和/或变体.source_string: Listings and/or product variations advertising devices with false, exaggerated, unreasonable, or impossible capacities/specifications are prohibited on Wish. Please create a new listing that accurately represents the product being sold.

Wish 禁止销售设备容量/规格虚假、夸张、不合理或无法实现的产品和/或变体（例.source_string: Listings and/or product variations advertising devices with false, exaggerated, unreasonable, or impossible capacities/specifications (e.g., the sale of storage devices with false or impossible capacities) are prohibited on Wish. Listings which misrepresent products or set false expectations for customers are considered misleading and is in direct violation of Wish's policies. Please create a new listing that accurately represents the product being sold.

Wish 通常不允许销售维生素和补充剂产品。 Wish 可能会制定和支持相关计划.source_string: Wish does not generally permit the sale of vitamins & supplement products. Wish may develop and support programs to permit select pre-approved merchants to offer certain items under special terms and conditions as described below.

Wish 通常不允许销售被监管机构分类为医疗设备或需要处方和/或医学专业人员监督.source_string: Wish does not generally permit the sale of products classified by regulators as medical devices or which require a prescription and/or a medical professional's supervision. For example, in the U.S. products classified by the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) as medical devices or that have not been approved by the FDA for over-the-counter sales may not be sold on Wish. At its option Wish may develop and support programs to permit select merchants to offer certain items under special terms or conditions.

Wish 通常不允许销售食品。 Wish 可能会制定和支持相关计划，允许特定商户.source_string: Wish does not generally permit the sale of food products. Wish may develop and support programs to permit select merchants to offer certain items under special terms or conditions.

Wish 通常每月两次向商户支付其符合条件交易的款项，但可能会在某些情况下并在通.source_string: Wish generally will disburse payments to merchants for their eligible transactions twice per month, but may change the frequency of disbursements at its discretion under certain circumstances and upon notice to merchants. This disbursement schedule may change, at Wish’s reasonable discretion, if (a) the merchant is not in compliance with the Terms of Service or these Fees and Payment policies, (b) the merchant changes its payment provider during a payment cycle, (c) the merchant is involved in a third-party claim, legal proceeding, or governmental inquiry related to the merchant’s use of the Services, (d) Wish reasonably suspects that the merchant account has security vulnerabilities, has been hacked, or otherwise has been compromised, or (e) Wish has communicated a different disbursal schedule to the merchant. Upon making a payment disbursal to the merchant, it may take{%1=A number, e.g. 5} - {%2=A number, e.g. 7} business days for the funds to arrive in a merchant’s bank account or payment provider’s account.

Wish generally will disburse payments to merchants for their eligible transactions twice per month, but may change the frequency of disbursements at its discretion under certain circumstances and upon notice to merchants. This disbursement schedule may change, at Wish’s reasonable discretion, if (a) the merchant is not in compliance with the Terms of Service or these Fees and Payment policies, (b) the merchant changes its payment provider during a payment cycle, (c) the merchant is involved in a third-party claim, legal proceeding, or governmental inquiry related to the merchant’s use of the Services, (d) Wish reasonably suspects that the merchant account has security vulnerabilities, has been hacked, or otherwise has been compromised, or (e) Wish has communicated a different disbursal schedule to the merchant. Upon making a payment disbursal to the merchant, it may take{%1=A number, e.g. 5}-{%2=A number, e.g. 7} business days for the funds to arrive in a merchant’s bank account or payment provider’s account.

The 1500 order amount is counted on a per-geographic region basis and separately between the two rate structures (e.g., 1500 to the EU or 1500 to non-EU destinations)._

_*如果为产品启用了计算运费功能，Wish 将基于以下佣金模式之一向商户付款：(.source_string: _*If Calculated Shipping is enabled for a product, Wish will pay the merchant either: (a) a variable amount of the merchant-provided product price **plus** the calculated shipping price (combined), OR (b) a percentage (note, the remaining percentage retained by Wish is called the "commission rate" percentage), OR (c) a set amount of the merchant-provided product price **plus** the calculated shipping price (combined)._ [Learn More]({%1=Zendesk URL})

Disputes also include, but are not limited to, claims that: (a) you bring against our employees, agents, Affiliates, or other representatives; or (b) that Wish brings against you. Disputes also include, but are not limited to, (i) claims in any way related to or arising out of any aspect of the relationship between you and Wish, whether based in contract, tort, statute, fraud, warranty, misrepresentation, advertising claims, or any other legal theory; (ii) claims that arose before the Agreement or out of prior Agreement(s) with Wish; (iii) claims that are subject to on-going litigation; or (iv) claims that arise after the termination of the Agreement.

为了使我们能够遵守反恐怖主义、反洗钱、金融服务等法律法规，您必须在我们首次要求时.source_string: In order to enable us to comply with anti-terrorism, anti-money laundering, financial services, and other laws and regulations, you must provide certain KYC information about you, your activities and your shareholders ("Registration Information") upon our first request. You warrant unconditionally that all Registration Information provided by you is correct and up-to-date. You will provide us with at least three business days prior written notice of any change of the Registration Information. You will on first request from us provide any additional information and supporting documentation regarding your activities, such as your identity and those of your shareholders, as we may reasonably deem necessary to ensure compliance with applicable laws and regulations and third party requirements. You agree and acknowledge that we may run further checks on your identity, creditworthiness and background by contacting and consulting relevant registries and governmental authorities.

For example, if you have already enabled shipping to the United States, you will begin receiving orders from all other countries listed below. [Learn more]({%1=Zendesk URL}).

Each party hereby waives any right to seek or recover punitive damages with respect to any Dispute resolved by arbitration, except where an applicable statute or other law allows for punitive damages.

The arbitrator will decide the rights and liabilities, if any, of you and Wish. The arbitration proceeding will not be consolidated with any other matters or joined with any other proceedings or parties. The arbitrator shall have the authority to grant motions dispositive of all or part of any claim or dispute. The arbitrator shall have the authority to award monetary damages and to grant any non-monetary remedy or relief available to an individual under applicable law, the arbitral forum's rules, and these Terms (including the Arbitration Agreement). The arbitrator shall issue a written award and statement of decision describing the essential findings and conclusions on which any award (or decision not to render an award) is based, including the calculation of any damages awarded. The arbitrator shall follow the applicable law. The arbitrator has the same authority to award relief on an individual basis that a judge in a court of law would have. The award of the arbitrator is final and binding upon you and us.

Notwithstanding this mediation and arbitration policy, either party may apply to a court of competent jurisdiction as necessary to enforce an arbitration award, or to seek a temporary restraining order or preliminary injunction to ensure that the relief sought in arbitration is not rendered ineffectual during the pendency of, or after the rendition of, a decision in any arbitration proceeding. The institution of any action shall not constitute a waiver of the right or obligation of any party to submit any claim seeking relief other than injunctive or enforcement relief to arbitration. Further, any party seeking to enforce an award of an arbitrator(s) shall submit the award under seal to maintain protections of confidential information, and you and Wish hereby agree and consent to the filing of such a submission, motion, or order under seal.

As a merchant on Wish, you are responsible for ensuring that your products and product listings meet all applicable mandatory product standards and legal requirements of the regions you ship to and from, and that your products and product listings satisfy all local or national laws, regulations, and product compliance and/or safety rules. You are also responsible for complying with all local or regional non-conformity laws, including but not limited to honoring and processing consumers’ rights to return and refund pursuant to any such non-conformity laws.

If a product listing is detected to not comply with Wish’s Prohibited Product Listings policies, the merchant may be penalized and the product listing may be taken down. Penalties range from a). {%1=Format Currency} per violating product to b). {%2=Format Currency} per violating product plus the total order value for all orders generated by the violating product during its lifetime, depending on the severity of the violation. 作为一家全球在线电子商务交易平台，Wish 由 ContextLogic Inc.source_string: Wish--a global online e-commerce marketplace platform--is developed, operated, and supported by ContextLogic Inc. (“CL Inc.”), a U.S. headquartered company. Wish is offered to consumers in various regions around the world by local affiliates of CL Inc., such as ContextLogic B.V. in Continental Europe. Wish is currently available on both standard desktop and mobile web browser, as well as a native mobile app, and is a technology platform that serves as a marketplace interface where businesses and manufacturers (“Merchants”) can list and sell their goods directly to consumers. The Wish community thrives when the items offered and sold by Merchants are safe and conform to applicable product safety laws, standards/certifications, and regulations.

作为一家正规的金融公司，ContextLogic BV（ContextLogic.source_string: As a regulated financial company, ContextLogic BV, a subsidiary of ContextLogic Inc. (dba Wish) must, perform Know Your Customer (KYC) on its European Economic Area (EEA) Merchants. The need to know who our Merchants are is related to the need to control the risks involved in providing services to you, including: money laundering, terrorism financing, fraud, bribery, corruption, tax evasion, and reputational risks. This process also helps to ensure the security of your account and Wish as a trusted Marketplace.

作为法人，您在注册和协议期间声明、保证、承诺并担保：(a) 您根据适用法律合法成.source_string: As a legal person, you represent, warrant, promise and guarantee that during the period of registration and agreement: (a) you are legally established in accordance with applicable law, validly existing and in good operation; (b) you have all the necessary legal qualifications, rights, capabilities and authorities to sign this agreement, fulfill duties accordingly and grant rights, licensing and authority required by this agreement, and have the permissions, approvals and licenses required by your business and the sale of the items in the relevant countries; (c) you and your affiliates will comply with all laws to fulfill your rights and duties in this agreement; (d) when offering any items for sale through the Services, you are in full compliance with all legislation, statutes, regulations and other enactments having the force of law and all industry codes, policies or guidelines and any applicable direction, statement of practice, policy, rule or order given by a regulator which apply from time to time in the country from which or to which the items are sold and/or offered (“Applicable Laws and Regulations”); (e) you shall maintain such records as are necessary pursuant to such Applicable Laws and Regulations and shall promptly on request make them available for inspection by any relevant authority that is entitled to inspect them; (f) you shall monitor any changes in the Applicable Laws and Regulations which may impact the sale of the items through the Services; (g) you shall directly notify Wish by email and in writing of any investigation and potential claim that are instigated by any regulator in relation to the items offered through the Services; (h) you shall promptly remove any and all offerings of items from the Services whenever these infringe the Applicable Laws and Regulations, become otherwise prohibited in the relevant countries, and/or when these are included in (an updated version of) the Merchant Policies ; and (i) you and your financial institution(s) are not subject to sanctions or otherwise designated on any list of prohibited or restricted parties or owned or controlled by such a party, including but not limited to the lists maintained by the United Nations Security Council, the US Government (e.g., the US Department of Treasury’s Specially Designated Nationals list and Foreign Sanctions Evaders list and the US Department of Commerce’s Entity List), the European Union or its member states, or other applicable government authority.

(e) you shall maintain such records as are necessary pursuant to such Applicable Laws and Regulations and shall promptly on request make them available for inspection by any relevant authority that is entitled to inspect them; 商户可在创建产品详情页时提供对比价格或参考价格（“MSRP”）。 MSRP 字段.source_string: Listings may include a field for a comparison or reference price (“MSRP Field”). Merchants are not required to provide a value in any such MSRP Field. If Merchants choose to provide a value for an MSRP Field (a “Reference Price”), each Reference Price must comply with this Policy. A Reference Price must be truthful and not misleading, and the Merchant may only include a Reference Price in a Listing if that dollar figure is an actual reference price of the item. This means it is either: (a) the Manufacturer’s Suggested Retail Price (MSRP) or similar list price of the product; or (b) the price at which the item was recently offered for sale and for a reasonable period of time.

商户在销售安全设备产品时必须遵守所有适用的区域和当地法规及法律要求。 商户负责获.source_string: Merchants must comply with all applicable regional, local regulatory, and legal requirements when selling safety equipment products. The merchant is responsible for acquiring safety certifications and proof of authorization to sell safety equipment products in qualifying shipping regions. Wish reserves the right to request additional information or documentation from merchants (or their suppliers) about their products at any time for product/regulatory compliance purposes without notice. Used safety equipment products are prohibited. Listings found to be in violation of this policy are subject to various repercussions, including removal without notice.

商户在销售宠物食品时必须遵守所有适用的区域和当地法律要求。 商户负责获取授权证明.source_string: Merchants must comply with all applicable regional and local legal requirements when selling pet food products. The merchant is responsible for acquiring proof of authorization and licenses to sell and must display the proper labeling requirements for pet food products in qualifying shipping regions. Wish reserves the right to request additional information or documentation from merchants (or their suppliers) about their products at any time for product/regulatory compliance purposes without notice. Listings found to be in violation of this policy are subject to various repercussions, including removal without notice.

商户在销售无酒精饮料时必须遵守所有适用的区域和当地法规及法律要求。 商户负责获取.source_string: Merchants must comply with all applicable regional and local regulatory and legal requirements when selling beverages without alcohol. The merchant is responsible for acquiring proof of authorization to sell and must display the proper labeling requirements for Beverage products in qualifying shipping regions. Wish reserves the right to request additional information or documentation from merchants (or their suppliers) about their products at any time for product/regulatory compliance purposes without notice. Listings found to be in violation of this policy are subject to various repercussions, including removal without notice.

商户在销售植物和植物种子产品时必须遵守所有适用的区域和当地法律要求。 商户负责获.source_string: Merchants must comply with all applicable regional and local legal requirements when selling plant and plant seed products. The merchant is responsible for acquiring and maintaining valid proof of authorization and licenses to sell and must display the proper labeling requirements for plant and plant seed products in qualifying shipping regions. Wish reserves the right to request additional information or documentation from merchants (or their suppliers) about their products at any time for product/regulatory compliance purposes without notice. Listings found to be in violation of this policy are subject to various repercussions and/or removal without notice.

商户在销售食品时必须遵守所有适用的区域和当地法律法规要求。 商户负责获取销售授权.source_string: Merchants must comply with all applicable regional and local regulatory legal requirements when selling food products. The merchant is responsible for acquiring proof of authorization to sell and must display the proper labeling and safety requirements for food products in qualifying shipping regions. Wish reserves the right to request additional information or documentation from merchants (or their suppliers) about their products at any time for product/regulatory compliance purposes without notice. Listings found to be in violation of this policy are subject to various repercussions, including removal without notice.

商户在销售食品时必须遵守所有适用的区域和当地法规及法律要求。 商户负责获取和保持.source_string: Merchants must comply with all applicable regional and local regulatory and legal requirements when selling food products. The merchant is responsible for acquiring and maintaining all required authorizations, licenses, registrations or permissions to distribute or sell for vitamin & supplement products meeting all labeling requirements, and complying with all applicable health and safety requirements in qualifying shipping regions. Wish reserves the right to request additional information or documentation from merchants (or their suppliers) about their products and compliance with all applicable requirements at any time for product/regulatory compliance purposes without notice. Merchants and listings found to be in violation of this policy are subject to monetary penalties and/or removal without notice.

商户必须通过 WishPost 履行此订单。.source_string: Merchants must fulfill this order via WishPost.

商户必须遵守 **《联邦种子法案》** 政策下的国家法律，以及 CFR Titl.source_string: Merchants must abide by national laws under the **Federal Seed Act** policy, as well as the requirements set forth under CFR Title 7 (7 U.S.C.) - Agriculture:{%1=Example: }* Plants & Plant Seeds must be labeled in the language corresponding to the country of sale it is sold to (Ex. English for the United States) with the following information{%2=Example: }* Full name and address of the shipper or a code designation identifying the shipper must be printed on the label.{%3=Example: }* Shipments must include all required information, including, but not limited to scientific name of the plant/seed, quantity of plants/seeds country and locality where grown, and permit number if applicable.{%4=Example: }* A _**phytosanitary certificate**_ (a certificate issued by the originating country’s National Plant Protection Organization (NPPO) certifying the plant to be disease and pest free, and attesting to its origin). Tomato and pepper seeds must be tested for virus and viroid diseases.{%5=Example: }* If importing into the U.S.: (i) a USDA Import permit (issued by the USDA to importers in the U.S. only – foreign based persons are ineligible to receive a permit); and (ii) other required documents, including CBP import documents, shipping labels, accurate manifests, etc.{%6=Example: }* Unless exempt or specifically approved by the USDA’s Animal Plant Health Inspection Service (APHIS), plants must be free of sand, soil, earth, or other growing media. Plants may not be more than two years old and may not be over 6 feet tall or have a stem diameter of over 4 inches.{%7=Example: }* Plants and seeds must be packed in approved packing materials.{%8=Example: }

商户必须遵守《加州65号提案》中规定的各项义务.source_string: Merchants must comply with their independent obligations under California’s Proposition 65

商户必须遵守《欧盟市场监管法规 (EU) 2019/1020》中规定的各项义务，.source_string: Merchants must comply with their independent obligations under the Market Surveillance Regulation (EU) 2019/1020, including but not limited to, providing a Responsible Person(s) for certain applicable products sold into relevant markets

商户必须遵守《爆炸物前体管理条例》(EU) 2019/1148规定的义务。 此外.source_string: Merchants must comply with their obligations under the Explosives Precursors Regulation (EU) 2019/1148. Additionally, merchants must ensure certain restricted explosive precursor items under the Explosives Precursors Regulation (EU) 2019/1148 are not available for sale in jurisdictions they are prohibited in, and that suspicious transactions over other certain reportable explosive precursors are reported to applicable national authorities within 24 hours of detection.

商户必须遵守关于辅助食品的《土耳其食品法典》条例公报第2013/49号，还包括但.source_string: Merchants must abide by the Turkish Food Codex Regulations Communiqué No. 2013/49 on Supplementary Foods but also not limited to national & regional laws:{%1=Example: }* All products must comply with all laws and regulations in Turkey.{%2=Example: }* A valid barcode (product identifier) ​​is required for each product that is registered and associated with the product.{%3=Example: }* Abide by Annex-2 & Annex-1 of the Communiqué on Supplementary Foods (2013/49){%4=Example: }* Supplements must comply with the Ministry of Agriculture and Forestry{%5=Example: }* Must specify the recommended dosage and comply with other mandatory information/warnings for consumers (eg the need to keep them out of the reach of small children{%6=Example: }* Abide by the Turkish Food Codex labeling regulations, which includes but not limited to:{%7=Example: }{%8=Example: }* The phrase "food supplement," where applicable.{%9=Example: }{%10=Example: }* Names of nutrients or substances that characterize the product and have nutritive and/or physiological effects{%11=Example: }{%12=Example: }* Recommended intake for daily consumption{%13=Example: }{%14=Example: }* A warning not to exceed the stated recommended daily dose.{%15=Example: }{%16=Example: }* Nutrition claims approved within the scope of Turkish Food Codex Regulation on Nutrition and Health Claims (Official Gazette No. 29960)

商户必须遵守其各项有关生产者责任延伸 (EPR) 的义务，包括但不限于由《欧盟废.source_string: Merchants must comply with their independent Extended Producer Responsibility (EPR) obligations, including but not limited to, those transposed into national laws by other statutory instruments such as the EU Waste Framework Directive 2008/98/EC, and provide confirmation of their compliance to Wish upon request. At a minimum, Merchants must provide Wish with truthful and accurate information regarding their EPR registration information, including but not limited to EPR registration numbers and the associated Producer Responsibility Organization (PRO)

商户必须遵守国家法律、《2006年 FSS 法案》和欧洲食品安全局 (EFSA).source_string: Merchants must abide by national laws, the FSS Act 2006, and the European Food Safety Authority (EFSA):{%1=Example: }* Provide name of the food{%2=Example: }* List of ingredients{%3=Example: }* Any ingredient or processing aid listed in Annex II or derived from a substance or product listed in Annex II causing allergies or intolerances used in the manufacture or preparation of a food and still present in the finished product, even if in an altered form{%4=Example: }* the quantity of certain ingredients or categories of ingredients{%5=Example: }* Net quantity of the food{%6=Example: }* the date of minimum durability or the ‘use by’ expiration date{%7=Example: }* Label any special storage conditions and/or conditions of use;{%8=Example: }* Provide name or business name and address of the food business operator{%9=Example: }* Food Business Operator (“FBO”) registration/License{%10=Example: }* Label Country of origin or place of provenance{%11=Example: }* Instructions for use{%12=Example: }* Nutrition declaration{%13=Example: }* Additional labeling for additives

商户必须遵守国家法律和 UN/ECE R44-联合国欧洲经济委员会的规定：{%1.source_string: Merchants must abide by national laws and the UN/ECE R44-United Nations Economic Commission for Europe:{%1=Example: }* A product image that displays the ECE approval label, to demonstrate compliance with ECE R 44/4 or ECE R 129 (i-Size){%2=Example: }* Images of the manual and safety instructions in the language of the country of sales{%3=Example: }* Homologation certificate issued by government of the country of approval{%4=Example: }* A test report from a certified body showing compliance with Furniture and Furnishings Fire Safety Regulations 1988

商户必须遵守国家法律和**《危险物质和新生物法》（新西兰）**及**《生物安全进.source_string: Merchants must abide by national laws and the **Hazardous Substances and New Organisms Act (New Zealand)** and the **Biosecurity Import Conditions system (Australia)**.

商户必须遵守国家法律和**《国际植物保护公约》 (IPPC) **及**《196.source_string: Merchants must abide by national laws and the **International Plant Protection Convention (IPPC)** and the **International Union for the Protection of New Varieties of Plants 1961 (UPOV Convention)**.

商户必须遵守国家法律和**欧盟植物健康法则**：{%1=Example: }*.source_string: Merchants must abide by national laws and the **EU Plant Health Rules**:{%1=Example: }* Requirements for internal movements – Regulation (EU) 2019/2072 – Annex VIII, IX and X{%2=Example: }* Production controls and inspections at the place of production during the growing season and immediately after harvest;{%3=Example: }* Official producer registration;{%4=Example: }* Plant passports, issued to accompany the plants, products and other objects once they have passed all the EU checks.

商户必须遵守国家法律和**联合国粮食及农业组织（亚洲及太平洋地区）的《植物保护协.source_string: Merchants must abide by national laws and the **Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nation (Asia and the Pacific)’s Plant Protection Agreement**.

商户必须遵守国家法律和欧洲食品安全局 (EFSA) 的规定：{%1=Exampl.source_string: Merchants must abide by national laws and the European Food Safety Authority (EFSA):{%1=Example: }* Provide name of the food{%2=Example: }* List of ingredients{%3=Example: }* any ingredient or processing aid listed in Annex II or derived from a substance or product listed in Annex II causing allergies or intolerances used in the manufacture or preparation of a food and still present in the finished product, even if in an altered form{%4=Example: }* the quantity of certain ingredients or categories of ingredients{%5=Example: }* Net quantity of product{%6=Example: }* Date of minimum durability or the ‘use by’ date{%7=Example: }* Label any special storage conditions and/or conditions of use;{%8=Example: }* Provide name or business name and address of the food business operator{%9=Example: }* Label Country of origin or place of provenance{%10=Example: }* Instructions for use{%11=Example: }* Nutrition declaration

商户必须遵守国家法律并符合 FEDIAF、欧盟法规 Regulation (EC.source_string: Merchants must abide by national laws meet all requirements of the FEDIAF, Regulation (EC) No 1069/2009, Commission Regulation (EU) No 142/2011, & Regulation (EC) No 999/2001:{%1=Example: }* Comply with all applicable EU and local laws{%2=Example: }* Abide by Regulation 1169/2011/EC{%3=Example: }* Label:{%4=Example: }{%5=Example: }* food's name{%6=Example: }{%7=Example: }* Ingredients{%8=Example: }{%9=Example: }* any special storage conditions{%10=Example: }{%11=Example: }* nutrition information{%12=Example: }{%13=Example: }* place of manufacture{%14=Example: }* Import/export: Laws restrict the import and export of many food products

商户必须遵守国家法律并符合美国食品药物管理局兽医中心和美国饲料管理协会 (AAF.source_string: Merchants must abide by national laws and meet all the requirements of the United States Food and Drug Administration's Center for Veterinary Medicine & AAFCO:{%1=Example: }* Products manufactured in a private residence and all manufacturing facilities must be registered with FDA under the Bioterrorism Act{%2=Example: }* Canned Food: must register your processing method with the federal government to ensure that you are producing a safe product.{%3=Example: }* A Good Manufacturing Practices (GMP) certificate from an accredited certifying body or A Global Food Safety Initiative (GFSI) recognized certificate. {%4=Example: }* 21 CFR 507 - Current Good Manufacturing Practice, Hazard Analysis, and Risk-Based Preventive Controls For Food For Animals{%5=Example: }* Abide by all state and federal laws

商户必须遵守国家法律并遵守《澳大利亚新西兰食品标准》(FSANZ)：{%1=Ex.source_string: Merchants must abide by national laws and comply with the FSANZ (Food Standards Australia New Zealand): {%1=Example: }* Label written clearly {%2=Example: }* Net weight and or net quantity{%3=Example: }* Expiry date in Australian format: DD/MM/YYYY{%4=Example: }* Advisory statements, warning statements and declarations (if applicable){%5=Example: }* Nutrition information{%6=Example: }* All food must be labeled with the contact details of the food supplier in New Zealand or Australia

Merchants must abide by national laws and comply with the FSANZ (Food Standards Australia New Zealand):{%1=Example: }* Label written clearly{%2=Example: }* Net weight and or net quantity{%3=Example: }* Expiry date in Australian format: DD/MM/YYYY{%4=Example: }* Advisory statements, warning statements and declarations (if applicable){%5=Example: }* Nutrition information{%6=Example: }* All food must be labeled with the contact details of the food supplier in New Zealand or Australia

商户必须遵守国家法律并遵守新西兰/澳大利亚标准 AS/NZ 1754：{%1=E.source_string: Merchants must abide by national laws and comply with the New Zealand/Australian Standard AS/NZ 1754:{%1=Example: }* Clear image of model number displaying on the product{%2=Example: }* Test report confirming AS/NZS 1754 child restraint systems for use in motor vehicles as per Consumer Protection Notice #3 of 2014{%3=Example: }* Restraint must also show the New Zealand Standard 'S' mark indicating it is certified

商户必须遵守国家法律并遵守美国农业部 (USDA) 和食品安全检验局 (FSIS.source_string: Merchants must abide by national laws and follow the U.S. Department of Agriculture ("USDA") & Food Safety Inspection Service (FSIS):{%1=Example: }* Register with the FDA if applicable{%2=Example: }* Properly prepare and seal foods {%3=Example: }* Products need to be shipped appropriately to protect the quality and safety of the food{%4=Example: }* Product name{%5=Example: }* List of Ingredients {%6=Example: }* Name and address of the packaging company{%7=Example: }* Expiration date{%8=Example: }* Net content quantity and weight (the weight of the contents, not including any packaging){%9=Example: }* Lot-controlled products with a shelf-life of greater than 90 days.{%10=Example: }* Perishable products must be removed from inventory 50 days before the expiration date

Merchants must abide by national laws and follow the U.S. Department of Agriculture ("USDA") & Food Safety Inspection Service (FSIS):{%1=Example: }* Register with the FDA if applicable{%2=Example: }* Properly prepare and seal foods{%3=Example: }* Products need to be shipped appropriately to protect the quality and safety of the food{%4=Example: }* Product name{%5=Example: }* List of Ingredients{%6=Example: }* Name and address of the packaging company{%7=Example: }* Expiration date{%8=Example: }* Net content quantity and weight (the weight of the contents, not including any packaging){%9=Example: }* Lot-controlled products with a shelf-life of greater than 90 days.{%10=Example: }* Perishable products must be removed from inventory 50 days before the expiration date

商户必须遵守国家法律，并且必须审查所有区域限制，包括但不限于：{%1=Examp.source_string: Merchants must abide by national laws and must review all regional restrictions, including but not limited to:{%1=Example: }

商户必须遵守国家法律，并且必须审查所有区域限制：{%1=Example: }*.source_string: Merchants must abide by national laws and must review all regional restrictions:{%1=Example: }* Where applicable, products must be registered with the National Health Surveillance Agency (ANVISA) or Ministry of Agriculture or their regional representatives.{%2=Example: }* Product testing reports, when requested, must come from laboratories accredited at ANVISA (Reblas), Ministry of Agriculture or Inmetro (NBR ISO / IEC 17025).{%3=Example: }* Food License from manufacturer if requested

Merchants must abide by national laws and must review regional restrictions:{%1=Example: }* Proof of being tested to the following regulations or standard(s) by an INMETRO certified laboratory{%2=Example: }* Follow other regional and local restrictions and laws

Merchants must abide by national laws and review regional restrictions:{%1=Example: }* Documents certifying compliance with ECE R44 / 04 or ECE R129 standards:{%2=Example: }* A photo that shows the E mark displayed on the product{%3=Example: }* A test report prepared by a testing institute certifying that the product complies with ECE R44 / 04 or ECE R129.

Merchants must abide by national laws and must review all regional restrictions:{%1=Example: }* Abide by Pet Food Safety Act{%2=Example: }* Abide by The Ministry of Agriculture, Food and Rural Affairs (MAFRA) policies{%3=Example: }{%4=Example: }* Acquire Organic certification standard{%5=Example: }* Ensure food items are properly packaged and stored safely{%6=Example: }* Clearly state the expiration date in the item description{%7=Example: }* State how perishable items will be delivered, and ensure they are delivered to the buyer before the expiration date

商户必须遵守国家法律，并且必须遵守所有区域限制：{%1=Example: }*.source_string: Merchants must abide by national laws and must review all regional restrictions:{%1=Example: }* Name of the product{%2=Example: }* Ingredients{%3=Example: }* Uses{%4=Example: }* Net weight or volume{%5=Example: }* Recommended amount for one time use{%6=Example: }* Instructions for use{%7=Example: }* Name or trade name and address of labeler including phone numbers{%8=Example: }* Clearly state the expiration date in the item description

商户必须遵守国家法律，并且必须阅读了解所有区域限制：{%1=Example: }.source_string: Merchants must abide by national laws and must review all regional restrictions:{%1=Example: }* Name of the product{%2=Example: }* Ingredients{%3=Example: }* Date of Use{%4=Example: }* Net weight or volume{%5=Example: }* Recommended amount for one time use{%6=Example: }* Instructions for use{%7=Example: }* Name or trade name{%8=Example: }* Address of labeler{%9=Example: }* Phone numbers of labelers/manufacturer

Merchants must abide by national laws and must review all regional restrictions:{%1=Example: }* Where applicable, products must be registered with the National Health Surveillance Agency (ANVISA) or Ministry of Agriculture or their regional representatives.{%2=Example: }* Product testing reports, when requested, must come from laboratories accredited at ANVISA (Reblas), Ministry of Agriculture or Inmetro (NBR ISO / IEC 17025).{%3=Example: }* Provide Food License from manufacturer upon request

Merchants must abide by national laws and must review all regional restrictions:{%1=Example: }* Comply with The Agriculture of Ministry (MAPA){%2=Example: }* Comply with The Secretariat of Agricultural Protection (SDA){%3=Example: }* Must be registered or licensed as required by law{%4=Example: }* Provide Food License or proof of registration from manufacturer upon request

商户必须遵守国家法律，并遵守各州和地区的所有相关法案，包括但不限于《1997年农.source_string: Merchants must abide by national laws, and follow all relevant Acts in each state and territory which includes but not limited to the Agricultural Compounds and Veterinary Medicines (ACVM) Act 1997:{%1=Example: }* Abide by the Animal Products Act (APA) 1999{%2=Example: }* Comply with Quarantine Act 1908, administered by DAFF Biosecurit{%3=Example: }* Follow labeling requirements of the Australian Standard for the Manufacturing and Marketing of Pet Food (AS 5812:2011){%4=Example: }* Must have a English language label{%5=Example: }* Net weight and or net quantity{%6=Example: }* Expiry date in Australian format: DD/MM/YYYY{%7=Example: }* Advisory statements, warning statements and declarations (if applicable){%8=Example: }* Nutrition information{%9=Example: }* Invoice showcasing:{%10=Example: }{%11=Example: }* Products have been bought and paid in the last 180 days{%12=Example: }* Buyer and seller address

商户必须遵守所有国家法律和欧盟食品补充剂指令2002/46/EC 和欧洲食品安全.source_string: Merchants must abide by all national laws and the EU Food Supplements Directive 2002/46/EC) & European Food Safety Authority - EFSA:{%1=Example: }* Must register as a Food Business Operator (FBO) with your local authority.{%2=Example: }* Food supplements sold in NI must include a NI or EU address for the food business.{%3=Example: }* Labels include:{%4=Example: }{%5=Example: }* the name of the business whose name the food is marketed under; or{%6=Example: }{%7=Example: }* the address of the business that has imported the food{%8=Example: }* List of ingredients, including allergens{%9=Example: }* conditions for use, including information on the recommended daily dosage and a warning not to exceed this{%10=Example: }* Storage instructions including a statement that the product should be stored out of the reach of young children{%11=Example: }* a ‘use by’ or ‘best before’ date{%12=Example: }* a nutritional declaration containing the names and amounts of the vitamins, minerals or other substances such as amino acids, fatty acids or plant extracts, that form the primary part of the product{%13=Example: }* a statement that food supplements should not be used as a substitute for a varied diet

商户必须遵守所有国家法律，包括澳大利亚治疗用品注册系统 (ARTG) 和澳大利亚.source_string: Merchants must abide by all national laws including the Australian Register of Therapeutic Goods (ARTG) & The Australian Regulatory Guidelines for Complementary Medicines (ARGCM):{%1=Example: }* Name of the dietary supplement{%2=Example: }* The net quantity or amount of the dietary supplement{%3=Example: }* Nutrition labeling{%4=Example: }* The ingredient list{%5=Example: }* The name and place of business of the manufacturer, packer, or distributor{%6=Example: }* To sell on Wish, sellers must display this information on the detail page.{%7=Example: }* Not be expired prior to reaching the buyer, and clearly state the expiration in the description{%8=Example: }* It is not allowed to claim any health benefits from legal substances that the Australian Register of Therapeutic Goods (ARTG) hasn't approved{%9=Example: }* Listings should include the AUST R or AUST L number from the Australian Register of (ARTG)

商户必须遵守所有国家法律，并且必须审查所有区域限制，包括但不限于：Anvisa.source_string: Merchants must abide by all national laws and must review all regional restrictions including but not limited to: Sanitary Registration from Anvisa, General Food Management (GGALI), & Brazilian Pharmacopeia:{%1=Example: }* In the case of imported products, the storage unit may be inspected by a health authority{%2=Example: }* The product name must be declared close to the product's brand and in legible characters{%3=Example: }* Recommendation for use according to population group, age range in the case of children{%4=Example: }* Quantity and frequency of consumption for each of the population groups indicated on the label{%5=Example: }* Highlight and bold warning:{%6=Example: }{%7=Example: }* “This product is not a medicine”{%8=Example: }{%9=Example: }* “Do not exceed daily recommendation of consumption indicated on the packaging”{%10=Example: }{%11=Example: }* “Keep out of the reach of children”{%12=Example: }* Instructions for storage{%13=Example: }* Nutritional information labeled:{%14=Example: }{%15=Example: }* Quantities of all nutrients, bioactive substances, enzymes and probiotics provided by the product{%16=Example: }{%17=Example: }* Percentage daily value (%DV) should be declared based on the recommended daily intake values.

商户必须遵守所有联邦和州法律，包括符合《膳食补充剂健康与教育法》、《食品、药品和.source_string: Merchants must abide by all federal and state laws including meeting all the requirements under the Dietary Supplement Health & Education Act, and the Food, Drugs and Cosmetics Act, and the Federal Trade Commission Act and all implementing regulations:{%1=Example: }* Descriptive name of the product stating that it is a supplement or vitamin{%2=Example: }* Name and place of business of the manufacturer, packer, or distributor{%3=Example: }* A complete list of ingredients{%4=Example: }* Net contents of the product{%5=Example: }* Nutrition labeling in the form of a "Supplement Facts" panel.{%6=Example: }* Country of origin{%7=Example: }* Must be labeled with all required warnings and instructions{%8=Example: }* Supplements must be manufactured, packed, and stored in compliance with FDA good manufacturing practices requirements

商户必须遵守美国联邦机动车辆安全标准 (FMVSS 213) 的国家法律：{%1.source_string: Merchants must abide by national laws by the U.S. Federal Motor Vehicle Safety Standard (FMVSS 213):{%1=Example: }* Product Images, Consumer Registration Card, and Manuals, as applicable (images should include all relevant safety information and compliance markings){%2=Example: }* Certificate of Compliance/Declaration of Conformity (“self-certification”) demonstrating compliance to CPSIA lead requirements (CPSIA Section 101){%3=Example: }* Test reports from an external or internal laboratory confirming each product was tested

Specifically, if an order is not confirmed delivered and the merchant-set Max Delivery Days for the order have already passed, or if the order is confirmed delivered after the merchant-set Max Delivery Days have already passed, it will be considered a Warehouse Late Delivery.

商户设置的最高变体价格最多可比最低变体价格高 {%1=Format Curren.source_string: Merchants may set the maximum variation price to be up to {%1=Format Currency} more than the minimum variation price. A product listing that does not adhere to the price variance policy will be removed and the account risks suspension.

增值税 (VAT) 是对产品和服务消费征收的间接税，在生产和分配过程的每个阶段征.source_string: Value Added Tax is an indirect tax on the consumption of goods and services collected at each stage of the production and distribution process (i.e. a transactional tax), but ultimately borne by the end consumer as the tax is effectively passed down along the supply chain. VAT is commonly, subject to exceptions, payable in the country where the customer is located or the ultimate destination of the goods.

增值税 (VAT)/商品服务税 (GST).source_string: Value Added Tax (VAT)/Goods and Services Tax (GST)

增值税 (VAT)/商品服务税 (GST) 是对产品和服务消费征收的间接税，在生.source_string: Value Added Tax / Goods and Services Tax is an indirect tax on the consumption of goods and services collected at each stage of the production and distribution process (i.e. a transactional tax), but ultimately borne by the end consumer as the tax is effectively passed down along the supply chain. VAT/GST is commonly, subject to exceptions, payable in the country/region where the customer is located or the ultimate destination of the goods.

如果 Wish 要求，则在要求后的三十 (30) 天内，您将自费在剩余期限内投保.source_string: If requested by Wish, then within thirty (30) days thereafter, you will maintain at your expense throughout the remainder of the Term general commercial, umbrella or excess liability insurance with the limits per occurrence and in aggregate requested by us covering liabilities caused by or occurring in conjunction with the operation of your business, including products, products/completed operations and bodily injury, with policy(ies) naming Wish and its Affiliates and assignees as additional insureds. At our request, you will provide to us certificates of insurance for the coverage.

如果 Wish 要求，则在该要求后的三十 (30) 日内，您将自费在剩余期限内投.source_string: If requested by Wish, within thirty (30) days after such request, you will maintain at your expense throughout the remainder of the Term general commercial, umbrella, or excess liability insurance with the limits per occurrence and in aggregate requested by us covering liabilities caused by or occurring in conjunction with the operation of your business, including products, products/completed operations, and bodily injury, with a policy or policies naming Wish and its Affiliates and assignees as additional insureds. 如果 Wish 认定您的行为或履行方式可能导致退货、退款、索赔、纠纷、违反我们的.source_string: If Wish determines that your actions or performance may result in returns, chargebacks, claims, disputes, violations of our terms or policies, or other risks to Wish or third parties, then Wish may in its sole discretion charge fees or withhold any payments or refunds to you for as long as Wish determines any related risks to Wish or third parties persist. Transactions for which Wish cannot confirm delivery of Products may be ineligible for refunds or reimbursement.

如果 Wish 选择在合资格付款之日前用您通过支付处理商或提供商做出的酌情预付款.source_string: In the event that Wish elects to remit an amount to you before the eligible payment date for such amount through a discretionary advance or advance made through your payment processor or provider (hereinafter a “Discretionary Advance”), Wish may reduce merchant’s payment eligibility by the amount of the Discretionary Advance either immediately or as soon thereafter as reasonably practicable.

如果 Wish 选择在放款日之前用您通过支付服务商或处理商做出的酌情预付款或预付.source_string: In the event that Wish elects to remit an amount to you before the eligible payment date for such amount through a discretionary advance or advance made through your payment processor or provider (hereinafter, a “**Discretionary Advance**”), Wish may reduce your payment by the amount of the Discretionary Advance either immediately or as soon thereafter as Wish deems practicable.

如果 Wish 重新上架或销售任何此类弃购产品，则商户理解并同意，对于任何重新上.source_string: Should Wish relist or sell any such abandoned product, Merchant understands and agrees that, for any relisted or sold product: (a) Wish shall not, and in no way be deemed to, take legal title to such product, (b) should Wish then complete a subsequent sale of such product, Merchant will not receive any payment beyond any payment that Merchant had been eligible to receive and already received for such product, and (c) Wish may use the same product listing, Merchant identification, and any other information previously used by Merchant in connection with any relisting or other disposition of any product for such product.

如果 Wish 重新上架该产品，则商户理解并同意，对于任何重新上架的产品：(a).source_string: Should Wish relist the product, the merchant understands and agrees that, for any relisted product: (a) Wish shall not, and in no way be deemed to, take legal title to such product, (b) should Wish then complete a subsequent sale of such product, the merchant will not receive payment beyond any payment that the merchant had been eligible to receive and already received for such order, and (c) Wish may, at its discretion, use the same product listing, merchant identification, and any other information previously used by the merchant for such product.

如果不及时重新履行此订单并提供新的有效物流跟踪单号，根据商户政策5.1规定，此订.source_string: If the order is not fulfilled again in a timely manner with a valid updated tracking number, it will be auto-refunded and penalized $50, per Merchant Policy 5.1.

如果不完成验证过程，您可能无法收到您店铺的付款。.source_string: If you do not complete the validation process you may not be able to receive payments from your store.
