如果产品图片、标题、描述、价格、变体和/或 Wish 用户实际收到的产品存在描述.source_string: A product may be considered misleading when there are ambiguities, inconsistencies or inaccuracies related to the product listing's image, title, descriptions, price, variations offered, and/or the product actually received by the Wish customer. The image, title, description, price, and variations used to advertise a product should clearly and accurately reflect the item being sold.

如果产品或产品变体被发现具有误导性，且在被发现具有误导性之日的过往{%2=A n.source_string: If a product listing or a product variation is detected to be misleading, the merchant may be penalized up to {%1=Format Currency}* if there were orders placed in the last {%2=A number, e.g. 30} calendar days from when the product or variation was detected as misleading. Merchant may also be responsible for {%3=A number, e.g. 100}% of any future refund on an order placed on the detected misleading product or variation.

如果产品或产品变体被发现具有误导性，商户将面临违规警告、产品被移除、Wish S.source_string: If a product listing or a product variation is detected to be misleading, a merchant faces the risk of an infraction warning, removal of the listing, negative impacts to the merchant’s Wish Standards tier, possible responsibility for 100% of refunds for orders placed for a misleading listing, and any other actions as may be permitted by any applicable law that Wish determines to be necessary and appropriate under the circumstances. Repeat violations may result in suspension or termination from Wish.

如果产品是仿品或侵犯知识产权，应由商户负责提供销售该产品的授权证据。.source_string: If a product is counterfeit or infringes on intellectual property, it is the burden of the merchant to provide proof they are authorized to sell the product.

如果产品的物流跟踪信息显示为“已妥投”，但用户未收到货，则商户须承担{%1=A.source_string: If an item’s tracking information marks the item as “delivered”, but the customer did not receive the item, the merchant is responsible for {%1=A number, e.g. 100}% of the cost of refunds.

如果产品被发现具有误导性，对于自判定该产品具有误导性之日的过往{%3=A num.source_string: If a product listing is detected to be misleading, the merchant may be penalized {%1=Format Currency}* per order and {%2=A number, e.g. 100}% of the order value for orders placed in the last {%3=A number, e.g. 30} days from when the product was detected as misleading, with a minimum penalty of {%4=Format Currency}* per detected misleading product.

如果产品销往的地区要求加贴符合性标志（例如欧盟的 CE 标志或英国的 UKCA.source_string: If you will be selling the product into a region in which the product is required to have a conformity marking (e.g., CE marking in the European Union or UKCA in the UK), you must upload an image of the product with that marking clearly visible. [Learn more]({%1=Zendesk URL})

如果产品销往的地区要求必须加贴符合性标志（例如欧盟的 CE 标志或英国的 UKC.source_string: If you intend to sell the product in a region that mandates a conformity marking (e.g., CE marking in the European Union or UKCA in the UK), it is necessary to upload an image of the product clearly displaying the required marking. [Learn more]({%1=Zendesk URL})

如果仍有问题，请在 %1$s (UTC) 后再次查看。感谢您的耐心等待。.source_string: Please check back after %1$s UTC if you are still experiencing issues. Thank you for your patience.

如果从中国大陆发货，请务必使用 WishPost。商户在 WishPost 平台.source_string: Make sure to utilize WishPost if shipping from Mainland China. Through WishPost, merchants will have the opportunity to select high performing shipping services, resulting in better logistics, positive customer experiences, and success on the Wish Platform. In addition, certain orders removed from the Advanced Logistics Program by merchants based on qualified reasons are also subject to specific logistics requirements; for the removed orders that require delivery confirmation, merchants must comply with the confirmed delivery timeline requirements outlined in Merchant Policy 5.4 and Merchant Policy 7.5.

如果以上均不适用，请从下面选择一个原因申诉延时订单：.source_string: If none of the above applies, select one reason below to dispute the late order:

如果仲裁的申请费超过提起诉讼的费用，Wish 将支付额外费用。 除非仲裁员裁定您.source_string: To the extent the filing fee for the arbitration exceeds the cost of filing a lawsuit, Wish will pay the additional cost. Wish shall also bear the cost of any arbitration fees, unless the arbitrator finds your claims, defenses, or other fee-generating activity to be asserted or conducted for an improper purpose or frivolous. You are responsible for all other additional costs that you may incur in the arbitration including, without limitation, attorneys’ fees and expert witness costs unless Wish is specifically required to pay such fees under Applicable Laws.

如果任何公司或个人拥有多个未经授权的商户账户，则其所有商户账户都可能面临冻结、封.source_string: If any company or person has multiple unauthorized merchant accounts, all merchant accounts risk suspension, termination, or other consequences identified in Wish’s Merchant Terms of Service.

如果任何法院或仲裁员确定本节所载对集体/合并/代表人诉讼的放弃因任何原因无效或不.source_string: If any court or arbitrator(s) determines that the class/consolidated/representative action waiver set forth in this Section is void or unenforceable for any reason or that arbitration can proceed on a class, consolidated, or representative basis, then the disputes, claims, or controversies will not be subject to arbitration and shall be litigated in federal court located in San Francisco, California, or in another forum as agreed upon between you and Wish in writing.

如果任何法院或仲裁员确定本节所载对集体／合并／代表诉讼的放弃因任何原因无效或不可.source_string: If any court or arbitrator determines that the class/consolidated/representative action waiver set forth in this section is void or unenforceable for any reason or that arbitration can proceed on a class, consolidated, or representative basis, then the disputes, claims, or controversies will not be subject to arbitration and must be litigated in federal court located in San Francisco, California, or in another forum as agreed upon between you and Wish in writing.

如果余额不足，则通知付款团队。.source_string: Notify disbursement team if the balances are insufficient.

如果使用非 Wish 认可的物流服务商配送订单，商户须承担{%1=A numbe.source_string: If an order is shipped with an unaccepted carrier, the merchant is responsible for {%1=A number, e.g. 100}% of the cost of refunds.

如果包裹的用户支付价格大于或等于{%1=A number, e.g. 135.0.source_string: If the customer-paid price of the consignment is £{%1=A number, e.g. 135.01} or more (excluding all other customer payments such as shipping, insurance, and taxes), the customer will be deemed as the importer of record and be responsible for remitting import VAT at Great Britain's border. Wish may, in some cases, collect VAT and facilitate this process directly with the shipping carrier so that the customer does not need to pay import VAT at the border.

如果包裹的用户支付价格小于或等于{%1=A number, e.g. 135.0.source_string: If the customer-paid price of the consignment is less than or equal to £{%1=A number, e.g. 135.01} (excluding all other customer payments such as shipping, insurance, and taxes), Wish will calculate, collect, and remit VAT on your behalf.

如果发现不适合在 Wish 上销售的产品，该产品将被移除。.source_string: If a product is found to be inappropriate for Wish it will be removed.

如果发现包裹内的产品不符合任一适用法律，包括发货国/地区（即出口地）或目的地国家.source_string: If a package is found to contain a product that does not comply with all applicable laws, including customs regulations for the origin country (i.e. location of export) or destination country (i.e. location of import), merchants may be penalized for the actual costs incurred by the carrier to destroy the product.

如果发现商户多次违反此政策，则该商户可能会受到其他处罚，包括减少曝光量、扣留付款.source_string: If a merchant is found to violate this policy multiple times, the merchant may then be subject to other penalties, including decreased impressions, payment withholding, account suspension, or account termination.

如果发生以下情形，在不限制任何其他补救的情况下，Wish 可以在不发出通知且不退.source_string: Without limiting any other remedies, Wish may, without notice, and without refunding any fees, delay or immediately remove Content, warn Wish's community of your actions, issue a warning to you, restrict your selling privileges, prohibit your access to the Services, temporarily or indefinitely suspend or freeze your account privileges, terminate your account, issue penalties against you, cause payments to you to be withheld or forfeit, take any other actions as may be required by law, and/or take technical and legal steps to keep you off the Services if: you breach these Terms (including, without limitation, any terms or policies incorporated herein); Wish is unable to verify or authenticate any of your personal information or Content; Wish believes that you are acting inconsistently with the letter or spirit of Wish's policies, have engaged in improper or fraudulent activity in connection with Wish, or your actions may cause legal liability or financial loss to Wish or other merchants using the Services; your account remains unconfirmed; your account remains inactive for a period of one-hundred-eight (180) days; Wish determines that your account has been used to engage in deceptive, fraudulent, or illegal activity, or to substantially violate our policies or this Agreement; Wish determines that the performance of your obligations under this Agreement may result in returns, claims, disputes, violations of our terms or policies, or cause any other risks to Wish, its users or other third parties; or Wish determines, suspect, or is informed that you are selling goods or engaging in acts in violation of the prohibited activities defined below under Section 5 of this Agreement (including, without limitation, selling goods that are counterfeit, illegal, or violate third-party rights).

如果发生误购，用户必须退回此产品才能获得退款。.source_string: If bought by mistake, this item must be returned for a refund.

如果发货产品的品类不是“女装”，“男装”，“鞋类”或“‘婴儿鞋/童鞋”，则您必须.source_string: You must enter the category the shipped product falls under if it is not 'Women's Apparel', 'Men's Apparel', 'Shoes' or 'Infant/Child Shoes'.

如果启用“售出不退政策”，则该类别中所有带标签的产品都将在 Wish 应用中标记.source_string: If Final Sale Policy is enabled, all tagged product listings within that category will be marked as Final Sale in the Wish app. You may remove individual products from Final Sale by editing the product under "All Products".

如果启用了以下必要功能，则账户有资格接收付款：.source_string: An account is eligible to receive payments if the following required feature(s) are enabled:

如果商户上架的产品的信息不准确，该产品可能会被移除，且相应的账户可能面临赔款或被.source_string: If a merchant provides inaccurate information about the product they are listing, the product could be removed and the account could face penalties or suspension.

如果商户上架的产品鼓励用户离开 Wish 平台或联系 Wish 平台以外的店铺，.source_string: If a merchant lists a product which encourages customers to leave Wish or contact a store outside of Wish, the product will be removed and the account risks suspension.

如果商户与另一个账户被冻结的商户关联，则前者的账户将有被冻结的风险。.source_string: If a merchant is linked to another merchant whose account is suspended, the merchant account is at risk of suspension.

如果商户为 EPC 订单提供模糊的及/或禁止使用的名称，则商户将会被收取{%1=.source_string: If merchants are found to provide vague and/or prohibited product names for EPC orders, merchants will be charged an EPC Order Product Name Correction Fee of {%1=Format Currency} per package.

如果商户使用用于通过 Wish 服务售卖产品的服务或功能，或与之相关的其他服务或.source_string: Should the merchant use additional services or product features related to the sales of items through or in connection with Wish’s services (e.g., ProductBoost, Fulfillment By Wish, etc.), these services or product features may be subject to certain additional or different fees as communicated by Wish. In the event Wish introduces a new service or product feature related to the sales of items through or in connection with Wish’s services, the fees for that service or product feature will be effective upon the launch of the service or product feature.

如果商户使用误导性物流单号，则其账户将面临违规或冻结的风险。.source_string: If a merchant uses misleading tracking numbers, the merchant account is at risk of infractions or suspension.

如果商户修改产品详情页（如产品名称、描述、图片），修改必须符合 Wish 的政策.source_string: Should a merchant change a product listing (e.g., product name, description, images) those changes must comply with Wish’s policies (including but not limited to those related to prohibited items, counterfeits, and intellectual property infringement). Product listings found to violate Wish’s policies will be removed, all payments may be withheld or forfeited, and the merchant account may be suspended.

如果商户利用 Wish 政策为自己谋利，该商户账户将面临被冻结的风险。.source_string: If a merchant is taking advantage of policies Wish has set in place for their own profit, the merchant account is at risk of suspension.

如果商户参与诈骗活动或规避收入分成，其须承担欺诈性订单的{%1=A number.source_string: If a merchant engages in fraudulent activity or circumvents revenue share, they are responsible for {%1=A number, e.g. 100}% of the cost of any refund on the fraudulent orders.

如果商户向用户寄送空包裹，其账户将面临被冻结的风险。.source_string: If a merchant is sending empty packages to customers, the merchant account is at risk of suspension.

如果商户向用户索取个人信息（包括电子邮箱地址），商户账户将面临被冻结的风险。.source_string: If a merchant has asked customers for their personal information including email address, the merchant account is at risk of suspension.

如果商户向用户索取个人信息，包括电子邮箱地址、付款信息等，则其账户可能会被冻结。.source_string: If a merchant has asked customers for their personal information including email address, payment information, etc., the merchant account is at risk of suspension.

如果商户启用了以下要求启用的功能，则其账户将获得接收付款的资格：.source_string: An account is eligible to receive payments if the following required features are enabled:

如果商户在 WishPost 中创建的订单没有有效的 Wish 订单 ID，商户.source_string: Merchants will be charged {%1=A number, e.g. 100}% of the EPC fees based on the pricing schedule, plus an additional {%2=A number, e.g. 50}% of the EPC fees based on the pricing schedule, for each order created in WishPost without a valid Wish Order ID.

如果商户在任何时间提供具有误导性的物流单号，商户将面临违规警告，且其 Wish.source_string: If at any time a merchant provides a tracking number found to be misleading, the merchant faces the risk of an infraction warning and negative impacts to the merchant’s Wish Standards tier. Repeat violations may result in suspension or termination from Wish.

如果商户在同一个产品详情页中上传了差异过大的产品，则该产品将被移除，且账户将面临.source_string: If a merchant includes different products of high variance in one listing, the product will be removed and the account risks suspension.

如果商户在税务设置中提供了相关信息，则此处将显示此特定欧盟目的国/地区的商户增值.source_string: If provided by merchant in Tax Settings, either merchant's VAT Tax Number for this particular EU destination country or merchant's One Stop Shop (OSS) number will be displayed here.

如果商户在退款前已收到税款，则税款退款将在下一个付款周期中扣除。.source_string: If merchants already received the tax amount before the refund, the refund tax amount will be deducted in the next payment cycle.

如果商户在通过 Wish 的服务或在与 Wish 的服务有联系的情况下销售商品时.source_string: Should the merchant use additional services or product features related to the sales of items through or in connection with Wish’s services (e.g., ProductBoost, Fulfillment by Wish, etc.), these services or product features may be subject to certain additional or different fees as communicated by Wish. In the event Wish introduces a new service or product feature related to the sales of items through or in connection with Wish’s services, the fees for that service or product feature will be effective upon the launch of the service or product feature. Unless otherwise stated, all fees are quoted in US Dollars (USD).

如果商户将产品详情页篡改为一款不同的产品，则该产品将被移除，其账户将被处以最高{.source_string: If a merchant changes a product listing into a new product, the product will be removed, the account will be penalized up to {%1=Format Currency}*, and the account will be at risk of suspension.

If a merchant changes a product listing into a new product, the product will be removed, the account will be penalized up to {%1=Format Currency}*, and the account will be at risk of suspension. Effective January 15, 2019 00:00 GMT, the penalty amount issued will be increased to {%2=Format Currency}*.

如果商户持续重复侵犯他人的知识产权，其账户将面临高额赔款、冻结和/或终止服务的风.source_string: If a merchant continues to repeatedly infringe on the intellectual property rights of others, their account is at risk of higher penalties, suspension and/or termination.

如果商户授权退货申请，Wish 将向用户提供退货单，用于之后放在退货包裹中。.source_string: Wish will provide a return slip to the customer to include in the returned parcels when merchants authorize the return request.

如果商户提供不准确或具有误导性的产品销售授权证据，其账户将被冻结。.source_string: If a merchant provides inaccurate or misleading proof of their authorization to sell a product, their account will be suspended.

如果商户提供了不适当的用户服务，其账户将面临被冻结的风险。.source_string: If a merchant has provided inappropriate customer service, the merchant account is at risk of suspension.

如果商户提供的产品信息不准确，则该产品可能会被移除，该商户可能被视为违规，且其账.source_string: If a merchant provides inaccurate information about the product they are listing, the product could be removed and the merchant may be subject to an infraction, account suspension, or account termination.

如果商户提供足够的安全认证和授权证明，部分产品可能有资格在某些配送区域进行销售。.source_string: Some products may be eligible for sale within certain shipping regions if the Merchant provides adequate safety certifications and proof of authorization. Wish additionally reserves the right to request additional information or documentation from merchants (or their suppliers) about their products at any time without notice, for product/regulatory compliance purposes. Merchants may also only sell products in this product category in the regions in which they are authorized to sell. Listings found to be in violation of this policy are subject to monetary penalties and/or removal without notice.

如果商户提供错误或误导性的产品销售授权证据，则其账户可能会被冻结。.source_string: If a merchant provides inaccurate or misleading proof of their authorization to sell a product, their account may be suspended.

如果商户有过多无法证实的物流单号，则其账户将面临被冻结的风险。.source_string: If a merchant has an unacceptably high number of tracking numbers that cannot be confirmed, the merchant account is at risk of suspension.

如果商户有过多的包裹被配送至错误地址，则其账户将面临被冻结的风险。.source_string: If a merchant has an unacceptably high number of packages sent to the wrong address, the merchant account is at risk of suspension.

如果商户未在 WishPost 中正确标识并申报敏感或特殊产品，但将该产品配送至.source_string: If merchants do not correctly identify and declare sensitive or special products in WishPost, but deliver such products to EPC warehouses, merchants will be charged an additional {%1=Format Currency} per package as a Sensitive Product Handling Fee.

如果商户未能使用新的物流跟踪单号及时重新履行此订单，根据商户政策5.1规定，此订.source_string: If the order is not fulfilled again in a timely manner with a valid updated tracking number, it will be auto-refunded and penalized $50, per Merchant Policy 5.1. [Learn more]({%1=Zendesk URL})

如果商户欺骗用户，其账户将面临被冻结的风险。.source_string: If a merchant is being disingenuous to customers, the merchant account is at risk of suspension.

如果商户注册账户时提供的信息不准确，其账户可能会被冻结。.source_string: If the information about an account provided during registration is inaccurate, the account risks suspension.

如果商户的“仓库延时妥投率”在订单付款被暂扣后的{%1=A number, e..source_string: If merchants are unable to achieve an acceptable Warehouse Late Delivery Rate {%1=A number, e.g. 24} weeks after the payment of an order is withheld, the order will no longer be eligible for payment

如果商户的产品、订单或店铺违反了 Wish 政策，商户将被处以赔款。此页面列出了.source_string: Penalties are issued when your products, orders or your store violated Wish policies. This page presents a list of Wish penalties.

如果商户的店铺销售假冒产品或仿品，商户账户将面临被冻结的风险。.source_string: If a merchant is selling fake or counterfeit goods, the merchant account is at risk of suspension.

如果商户的拒付率过高，其商户账户将面临被冻结的风险。.source_string: If a merchant has an unacceptably high chargeback ratio, the merchant account is at risk of suspension.

如果商户的自动退款率过高，其账户将面临被冻结的风险。.source_string: If a merchant has a high auto refund ratio, the merchant account is at risk of suspension.

如果商户的退款率过高，其账户将面临被冻结的风险。.source_string: If a merchant has a high refund ratio, the merchant account is at risk of suspension.

如果商户获准在其产品中提供保证，则必须履行向用户提供的任何保证，并及时回应保证问.source_string: If the merchant is approved to include warranty information in its listings, the merchant must honor any warranty provided to the customer and respond to warranty inquiries in a timely manner, but in any event not more than 5 business days after any customer inquiry. Wish does not review merchant warranty information for legal sufficiency. By permitting merchants to post warranty information, Wish does not accept any responsibility or liability for any failure of such warranty to meet applicable legal requirements. Wish does not accept any responsibility for merchants’ duties, responsibilities, or performance under the terms of the warranty.

如果商户要求用户在 Wish 以外的平台付款，其账户将被冻结。.source_string: If a merchant asks a customer to pay them outside of Wish, their account will be suspended.

如果商户要求用户提供付款信息、电子邮箱等个人信息，其账户将被冻结。.source_string: If a merchant asks a customer for personal information such as payment information, email, etc, their account will be suspended.

如果商户要求用户访问 Wish 以外的店铺，对应的商户账户将面临被冻结的风险和/.source_string: If a merchant has asked customers to visit stores outside of Wish, the merchant account is at risk of suspension and/or a penalty of {%1=Format Currency}* per incident. Please see [Policy 5.7 - Deceptive Fulfillment Policy]({%2=Example: #5.7}) for further information.

如果商户要求用户访问 Wish 平台外的店铺，或以任何方式引导用户离开 Wish.source_string: If a merchant has asked customers to visit stores outside of Wish or redirect customers outside Wish in any way, the merchant account is at risk of suspension.

如果商户要求用户通过“验证地址”功能验证其订单的收货地址，则规定妥投时限可能会延.source_string: In cases when the merchant requests that the customer verify his or her shipping address for an order through the “Verify Address” feature, the delivery requirement may be extended by {%1=A number, e.g. 48} working hours.

如果商户要求用户避开 Wish 平台付款，或要求用户直接付款，则其账户可能会被冻.source_string: If a merchant asks a customer to pay them outside of Wish, or requests a direct payment from a customer, the merchant account is at risk of suspension.

如果商户设置了**接受{%1=A number, e.g. 30}天免费退货**.source_string: If merchants set **Free {%1=A number, e.g. 30} day returns accepted** or **Prepaid {%2=A number, e.g. 30} day returns accepted** policies and choose Wish Return Authorization, Wish offers merchants a Wish Return Facility, available in certain countries. Once items arrive at the Wish Return Facility, Wish will issue refunds to customers. At the Wish Return Facility, Wish will dispose of the returned parcels. Wish will not return parcels or items to merchants. For any item that is not supported by a Wish Return Facility, Wish will automatically issue a returnless refund to customers.

If merchants set **Free {%1=A number, e.g. 30} day returns accepted** or **Prepaid {%2=A number, e.g. 30} day returns accepted** policy and choose Wish Return Authorization, Wish will provide customers with prepaid return shipping labels using the return address that merchants provide in the Return Setting. If products are returned to merchants’ return address, merchants are required to process refunds within {%3=A number, e.g. 48} hours in UTC time (including weekend). If merchants do not take any action, customers’ return requests will be routed to the Wish Customer Support team, which will process the requests on behalf of merchants. Merchants cannot dispute the results of these cases.

如果商户账户的延时确认履行率过高，则其账户将面临被冻结的风险。.source_string: If a merchant account has an unacceptably high late confirmed fulfillment rate, the merchant account is at risk of suspension.

如果商户选择[商户退货授权]({%1=Return Auth Learn Mor.source_string: If merchants choose [Merchant Return Authorization]({%1=Return Auth Learn More}), merchants can create a claim with Wish if they believe that the customer is fraudulent or unreasonable. Subsequently, Wish Customer Support will further review the return request based on merchant-provided evidence.

如果商户选择手动授权退货申请，则商户必须向用户提供带有以下地址的预付费退货标签：.source_string: If merchants choose to manually authorize a return request, merchants must provide a prepaid return label to the customer with a 1). domestic return address for non-European Union countries, or 2). an intra-European Union return address for European Union countries.

如果因为产品品类的申诉造成了收入分成调整，相关付款信息将在此处显示。[了解更多].source_string: If a Product Category Dispute results in a revenue share adjustment,the relevant payment information is included here. [Learn more]({%1=Learn More Link}).
If a Product Category Dispute results in a revenue share adjustment,the relevant payment information is included here. [Learn more]({%1=Zendesk URL}).

如果因产品配送至错误地址而产生退款，商户须承担{%1=A number, e.g.source_string: If a refund occurs because the item was sent to the wrong address, the merchant is responsible for {%1=A number, e.g. 100}% of the cost of the refund.

如果因订单在下单 X 个自然日后未确认妥投而产生退款，商户须承担{%1=A nu.source_string: If a refund occurs because an order is not confirmed delivered by X calendar days after the order is placed, the merchant is responsible for{%1=A number, e.g. 100}% of the cost of the refund.

如果因订单在释放给商户 X 个自然日后未确认妥投而产生退款，商户须承担{%1=A.source_string: If a refund occurs because an order is not confirmed delivered by X calendar days after the order is released to the merchant, the merchant is responsible for {%1=A number, e.g. 100}% of the cost of the refund.

如果因订单配送不完整而产生退款，商户须承担{%1=A number, e.g..source_string: If a refund occurs because the order shipped was incomplete, the merchant is responsible for {%1=A number, e.g. 100}% of the cost of the refund. An incomplete order is an order where the merchant did not ship the correct quantity of items or did not ship all parts of an item.

如果在{%1=Example: on Disbursement Kick or.source_string: Continue payment creation if it hasn't been completed yet {%1=Example: on Disbursement Kick or Exampl}

如果在商户账户冻结期间发生退款，商户需承担{%1=A number, e.g..source_string: If a refund occurs while the merchant account is suspended, merchants are responsible for {%1=A number, e.g. 100}% of the cost of the refund.

如果在商户账户冻结期间发生退款，商户须承担{%1=A number, e.g..source_string: If a refund occurs while the merchant account is suspended, the merchant is responsible for {%1=A number, e.g. 100}% of the cost of the refund.

如果在此日期前申诉成功，则可以撤销赔款。.source_string: The penalty can be reversed if dispute gets approved before this date

如果在该日前申诉成功，赔款将可被撤销.source_string: The fine can be reversed if dispute gets approved before this date

如果多个事件发生的时间间隔非常短（即，少于10秒），我们将忽略较早的事件并始终发.source_string: If these multiple events happen in a very short period of time (i.e. in less than 10 seconds) we will skip the older events and always send a notification for the latest event.

如果妥投失败并且物流服务商将产品退回发货人，商户须承担{%1=A number,.source_string: If delivery fails and the carrier returns the item to the sender, the merchant is responsible for {%1=A number, e.g. 100}% of the cost of the refund.

如果存在您不认识的设备或 IP，则可能有人未经您授权获得了您账户的访问权限。您应.source_string: If you don't recognize a device or IP, somebody may have gained unauthorized access to your account. You should:

如果店铺下架或移除了在过去{%2=A number, e.g. 9}天内 GMV.source_string: If a store disables or removes a promoted product with {%1=Format Currency}+ GMV* in the last {%2=A number, e.g. 9} days, or if a store disables a specific country for a promoted product with {%3=Format Currency}+ GMV* in the last {%4=A number, e.g. 9} days in that country, the store will be penalized {%5=Format Currency}*.

Once the store's refund rate improves and is no longer high, the merchant will be responsible for refunds as per standards.

如果您**不**打算使用 Fulfillment By Wish（FBW）项目或.source_string: If you do **NOT** plan to use the Fulfillment By Wish program or a non-bonded FBW warehouse, please dismiss this information here.

如果您不希望我们查看或访问您的设备位置，您可以关闭设备上的位置共享、更改设备的隐.source_string: If you do not want us to see or access your device location, you can turn off location sharing on your device, change your device privacy settings, or decline to share location on your browser.

如果您不提供真实准确的 EPR 注册号，Wish 将屏蔽您的产品和/或曝光量，这.source_string: Wish will block your product listings and/or impressions if you don't provide accurate EPR registration numbers. This may impact your sales in {%1=Countries Country}.

如果您与 ContextLogic Inc. 之间的商户服务条款到期或终止，则本.source_string: These Pay-out Terms shall terminate automatically in case of expiry or termination of the Merchant ToS between you and ContextLogic Inc.

如果您与一个或多个其他用户或其他外部方发生争议，您解除 Wish、其高级职员、员.source_string: In the event that you have a dispute with one or more other users or other outside parties, you release Wish, its officers, employees, agents, and successors from claims, demands, and damages of every kind or nature, known or unknown, suspected or unsuspected, disclosed or undisclosed, arising out of or in any way related to such disputes and/or our Services.

如果您产品的配送范围不包含欧盟和/或北爱尔兰，请忽略此提示。.source_string: If you do not ship products into the European Union (EU) and/or Northern Ireland, you can dismiss this tooltip.

工作日的定义为周一至周五。 周末和 [USPS 邮政假期](https://ab.source_string: Working days are defined as Monday through Friday. Weekends and [USPS Postal holidays](https://about.usps.com/news/events-calendar/postal-holidays.htm) will not be considered as working days. Note that all Wish Express orders must also be fulfilled (i.e., marked “shipped”) within {%1=A number, e.g. 5} calendar days from the order released time, per [Merchant Policy 5.1]({%2=Example: #5.1}). All orders, including Wish Express orders, are also subject to the [Merchant Policy 5.5 - Late Confirmed Fulfillment Policy]({%3=Example: #5.5}), which states that if an order is not confirmed shipped by the carrier within {%4=A number, e.g. 168} hours of the time the order is released, then the merchant will be penalized {%5=A number, e.g. 20}% of the order value, or {%6=Fine USD Amount}, whichever is greater. This policy is only applicable to confirmed fulfilled orders where (merchant price per item + shipping price per item) is less than {%7=Fine USD Amount}. However, if a Wish Express order is confirmed delivery by the carrier within the required arrival time frame, the penalty will be reversed.

当您使用服务时，例如您履行购买订单时，您可以从 Wish 用户处获取或获取有关.source_string: When you use the Services, such as when you fulfill a purchase, you may obtain personal information from or about a Wish user (“User Data”). Your use of User Data shall comply with applicable data protection law, including without limitation Europe’s General Data Protection Regulation. Unless you obtain a valid consent from the individuals described by User Data, you shall only use User Data in connection with the corresponding transaction with such user (e.g. shipping and fulfillment) or as necessary to meet your statutory legal requirements, such as tax and reporting requirements. You shall employ reasonable and appropriate measures to safeguard User Data from misuse, loss, destruction or unauthorized access or use. You acknowledge and agree that if Wish determines in good faith that additional agreements are necessary for compliance with applicable data protection law, you will promptly review and accept such agreements or cease using the Services or applicable portions thereof, such as sales into the European Union.

我们、我们的服务提供商或业务合作伙伴可能会通过自动化方式收集和使用各种信息，以协.source_string: We or our service providers or business partners may collect and use various pieces of information in an automated way to support analytics and advertising operations.

我们一直在努力改进我们的服务，因此我们可能需要更新本隐私政策。 我们可能会更新本.source_string: We're constantly trying to improve our Services, so we may need to update this Privacy Policy. We may update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes in the law, the Services, our companies, or advances in technology. We will alert you to a change by placing a notice on the Services or by sending an email. Our use of the information we collect is subject to the Privacy Policy in effect at the time such information is used.

我们不会对条款和条件执行任何追溯性变更，除非这些条款和条件需要遵守法律或监管义务.source_string: We will not impose any retroactive changes to terms and conditions, except when they are required to respect a legal or regulatory obligation or when the retroactive changes are beneficial for you.

我们不会有意收集或索取13岁以下的任何人的“个人信息”（由《美国儿童在线隐私保护.source_string: We do not knowingly collect or solicit "personal information" (as defined by the U.S. Children's Online Privacy Protection Act) from anyone under the age of 13. If you are under 13, please do not attempt to register for the Services or send any personal information about yourself to us. If we learn that we have collected personal information from a child under age 13, we will delete that information. If you believe that a child under 13 may have provided us personal information, please contact us at wps-privacy@wish.com.

我们不允许滥用第三方道德热线.source_string: Misuse of the Third Party Ethics Hotline will not be tolerated.

我们不参与此类活动；但是，如果您是已经向我们购买或租赁商品或服务的内华达州居民，.source_string: We do not engage in such activity; however, if you are a Nevada resident who has purchased or leased goods or services from us, you may submit a request to opt out of any potential future sales under Nevada law by emailing wps-privacy@wish.com. Please note we will take reasonable steps to verify your identity and the authenticity of the request. Once verified, we will maintain your request in the event our practices change.

我们与其他公司和个人合作以帮助我们提供服务，并且可能需要与他们共享信息，以便他们.source_string: We engage and/or partner with other companies and people to help us provide the Service and may need to share information with them so they can complete their work. Sometimes these companies are selected by you (and may have their own policies regarding their services and your data). Sometimes these companies are selected by us. For example: we may use a payment processing company to receive or deliver payments; or we may use a cloud services provider to store data.

我们为您提供了新的收款体验，您可以使用您自己的联动优势账户来管理 Wish 店铺.source_string: We bring you a new collection experience, you'll be able to manage wish stores with your own UMPAY account.

我们从**FBW库存**中选择了一些产品，并将其加入FBS（Fulfillmen.source_string: We selected some of your products from your **FBW inventory** and enrolled them into the Fulfillment By Store (FBS) program. These FBS products will be stocked in Wish's partner stores across the world.

我们会在完成信息处理目的或满足法定保留要求所需的时间段内保留您的信息。 我们保留.source_string: We keep your information for the time period required to complete the purposes for which it is processed or to satisfy legal retention requirements. The length of time for which we retain information depends on the purposes for which we collected and use it or the requirements of applicable laws.

我们会在终止生效前提前三十 (30) 天发出通知，并提供做出该决定的理由（即导致.source_string: We may terminate your use of any Services or terminate this Agreement for convenience with thirty (30) days’ advance notice prior to the termination taking effect, with a statement of reasons (i.e., facts or circumstances leading to the termination) for that decision. This notice period shall not apply where we (a) are subject to Applicable Laws that require us to terminate the Agreement or the Services without respect to that notice period; (b) exercise a right of termination under an imperative reason pursuant to Applicable Laws; or (c) can demonstrate that you have breached the Agreement.

我们保留访问、读取、保存和披露任何信息的权利，只要我们有充分的理由认为这些信息对.source_string: We reserve the right to access, read, preserve, and disclose any information that we in good faith believe is necessary to comply with law or court order; enforce or apply our [Wish Parcel Terms and Conditions]({%1=Wps Tos Link}) and other agreements; or protect the rights, property, or safety of ContextLogic Inc., our employees, our users, or others.

我们加入 Wish Express 的产品销量大幅增加，部分产品的销量翻了一番！.source_string: The sales volume of our Wish Express-enabled products has significantly increased, with some products doubling their sales!

我们只会在我们的服务范围内或根据合同、适用法律或法规的要求向第三方提供个人数据。.source_string: We will only make Personal Data available to third parties in the context of our Services or if so required by contract, applicable laws or regulations.

我们可以随时经我们全权酌情决定修改本协议（或 Wish 发布的任何政策或指引）中.source_string: We may modify any of the terms and conditions contained in this Agreement (or in any policy or guideline published by Wish) at any time and in our sole discretion. Any modifications will be effective upon the posting of a new set of terms on or within our Services (which we may do with or without notice to you). In some cases, we may notify you before or after such a change, including without limitation on any of our websites or in any merchant policy or other document, or by sending you an e-mail or other notification of such modifications. You are responsible for reviewing these locations and informing yourself of all applicable modifications, changes or notices.

我们可能会从第三方（例如业务合作伙伴、营销人员、研究人员、分析师）收集信息，包括.source_string: We may gather information, including demographic and statistical information, from third parties such as business partners, marketers, researchers, analysts. We may attribute this information to you based on your assignment to certain statistical groups. We may use this information to supplement the other information that we collect in order to improve our products, analytics, and advertising.

我们可能会向下述各接收方披露您的个人信息或您使用服务的相关信息。.source_string: We may disclose information about you or your use of the Services with the types of recipients described below.

我们可能会向与 ContextLogic Inc. 受共同所有或控制的其他公司（.source_string: We may share your information with other companies under common ownership or control with ContextLogic Inc. ("Affiliates"). These Affiliates use your information as described in this Privacy Policy.

我们可能会采取措施限制或阻止对数据集中的任何特定用户或设备进行识别，例如通过整合.source_string: We may take steps to limit or prevent identification of any particular user or device in sets of data, such as by combining information relating to many individuals ("aggregation") or removing or changing pieces of information about each individual. We may use de-identified data to help support our research and marketing efforts. This Privacy Policy does not apply to our use of such de-identified information.

我们可能会限制或暂停您对任何服务的使用，或限制或暂停本协议。 在限制或暂停生效时.source_string: We may restrict or suspend your use of any Services or restrict or suspend this Agreement. At the time of the restriction or suspension taking effect, we shall provide you with a statement of reasons (i.e., facts or circumstances leading to the restriction or suspension) for that decision. You shall act in a commercially reasonable manner, in accordance with Applicable Laws; as such, we may restrict or suspend without notice your use of any Services or restrict or suspend this Agreement in the event that we believe that you do not act in a commercially reasonable manner.

我们可能选择购买或出售资产，并可能共享或转让与评估和参与此类交易相关的用户信息（.source_string: We may choose to buy or sell assets and may share or transfer user information (including personal information) in connection with the evaluation of and entry into such transactions. Also, if we (or our assets) are acquired, or if we go out of business, enter bankruptcy, or go through some other change of control, user information could be one of the assets transferred to or acquired by a third-party.

我们有义务保护代您接收的款项。 为此，我们使用独立实体 Stichting Cu.source_string: We are obligated to safeguard the funds received on your behalf. For this purpose, we use a separate entity, Stichting Custodian ContextLogic Payments (“Foundation”). Parties acknowledge and agree that Foundation shall receive funds on behalf of Parties, and save them in the manner as instructed by us. Foundation is not required to verify the correctness of these instructions from us. Consequently, each payment made by Foundation is made on our instruction, and each incorrect payment is therefore the consequence of incorrect instructions to that effect given by us. Each (alleged) entitlement to a payment under this Pay-out Agreement will therefore be considered an (alleged) entitlement against us, and you hereby waive your right to demand such amount from Foundation or to take legal action to demand such an amount from Foundation. Hereby the Parties irrevocably agree that the Foundation can invoke this waiver against you and this right is granted without consideration (in Dutch "om niet") and is hence considered accepted between the parties. The parties hereby irrevocably and unconditionally agree to waive their rights to rescind, terminate, void, annul or otherwise invalidate this Section 6 on whatever ground or for whatever reason.

All processing of personal data by us is subject to our [Privacy Policy]({%1=Privacy Policy Link}), and we will take administrative, technical and physical measures reasonable from a commercial point of view to protect your Personal and Payment Data against unauthorized access or unintended loss or alteration. Notwithstanding the above, we cannot guarantee that unauthorized third parties will never be able to breach or circumvent the security measures taken by us and use the Personal and/or Payment Data for inappropriate purposes. You accept this risk if you provide us with your Personal Data.

You shall employ reasonable and appropriate measures to safeguard User Data from misuse, loss, destruction, or unauthorized access or use, and you are solely responsible for any failure to appropriately safeguard this information or any failures of the protections you have in place. You acknowledge and agree that if Wish determines that additional agreements are necessary for compliance with applicable Privacy and Security Laws, you will promptly review and accept such agreements or cease using the Services or applicable portions thereof, such as sales into the European Union or the United Kingdom.

根据内华达州法律，某些内华达州消费者可能出于金钱考虑而选择不向某人出售“个人身份.source_string: Under Nevada law, certain Nevada consumers may opt out of the sale of "personally identifiable information" for monetary consideration to a person for that person to license or sell such information to additional persons. "Personally identifiable information" includes first and last name, address, email address, phone number, Social Security Number, or an identifier that allows a specific person to be contacted either physically or online.

根据商户的 Wish 账户中注明的条款或商户可能与 Wish 签订的任何其他协议.source_string: Depending on the terms noted within the merchant’s Wish account or the terms of any other agreement the merchant may have with Wish, and depending on whether the item is bound for certain geography-located customers, when an item sells, Wish will pay a merchant either: (a) a variable amount of the item value based on a commission structure (outlined in the “Progressive Commission Structure” below), OR (b) a set amount of the item value. (Item value is defined as: “(merchant-provided product price + merchant-provided shipping price*)”).

Depending on the terms noted within the merchant’s Wish account or the terms of any other agreement the merchant may have with Wish, and depending on whether the item is bound for certain geography-located customers, when an item sells, Wish will pay the merchant either: (a) a variable amount of the item value based on a commission structure (outlined in the **“Progressive Commission Structure”** below), OR (b) a percentage as outlined in the **“Commission Rate Only Model”** below, OR (c) a set amount of the item value. (Item value is defined as: “(merchant-provided product price + merchant-provided shipping price*)”).

Depending on the terms noted within the merchant’s Wish account or the terms of any other agreement the merchant may have with Wish, Wish will either take a percentage or a set amount of the list price provided to Wish by the merchant when an item sells.

Depending on the terms noted within the merchant’s Wish account or the terms of any other agreement the merchant may have with Wish, when an item sells, Wish will pay the merchant either a percentage or a set amount of the listed product price plus the listed shipping price (combined) as provided to Wish by the merchant.

The arbitration will be conducted by a single arbitrator. Disputes involving claims and counterclaims with an amount in controversy under $250,000, not inclusive of attorneys' fees and interest, shall be subject to JAMS' most current version of the Streamlined Arbitration Rules and procedures available at [http://www.jamsadr.com/rules-streamlined-arbitration/ ]({%1=Jamsadr Rules Sl Link}); all other claims shall be subject to JAMS's most current version of the Comprehensive Arbitration Rules and Procedures, available at [http://www.jamsadr.com/rules-comprehensive-arbitration/ ]({%2=Jamsadr Rules Comp Link}). JAMS's rules are also available at [www.jamsadr.com]({%3=Jamsadr Link}) or by calling JAMS at 800-352-5267. If JAMS is not available to arbitrate, the parties will select an alternative arbitral forum. If there is a conflict between the JAMS Rules (or the rules of the alternative arbitral forum selected by the parties) and the rules set forth in this Agreement, the rules set forth in this Agreement will govern.

The requested Early Payment amount will be included in your next payment disbursement. The Early Payment amount will be evenly deducted from each disbursement during the term selected immediately after the next disbursement. Each deduction will include a monthly fee of {%2=Installment Fee Rate}%.

请查看以下更新并尽快采取措施。如果您未在**6月12日**前加入固定运费项目，这.source_string: Please review the following updates and take action as soon as possible. If you don’t enroll in flat rate shipping before **June 12**, these updates will automatically apply and Calculated Shipping will be enabled.

[Learn more]({%1=Zendesk URL}).

请注意，如果删除此仓库，依据“商户政策13”而被暂扣付款的所有订单将不会再获得付.source_string:
Please note that if this warehouse is deleted, any orders currently withheld under Policy 13 will no longer be eligible for payment. See Policy 13: Warehouse Fulfillment Policy for more details.

In addition, if this warehouse is deleted, you will not be allowed to recreate an identical warehouse in the next 2 weeks.

Are you sure you want to remove this warehouse?

请注意，如果删除此仓库，则根据《商户政策12》被暂扣付款的所有订单将不会再获得付.source_string: Please note that if this warehouse is deleted, any orders currently withheld under Policy 12 will no longer be eligible for payment. See [Policy 12: Warehouse Fulfillment Policy]({%1=Policy Link}) for more details.

请注意，如果您未完成此流程，支付给您店铺的付款可能会被暂扣。请重新验证您的店铺。.source_string: Note that payment may be withheld from your store if you do not complete this process. Please validate your store again.

请注意，如果您未完成此流程，支付给您账户的付款可能会被暂扣。请验证您的纳税身份。.source_string: Note that payment may be withheld for your account if you do not complete this process. Please validate your tax identity.

请注意，如果用户因产品质量问题发起退货，其必须将产品退回。所以如果退回的货物存在.source_string: Note that users are required to return the item if it has quality issues, so the returned item being damaged in some way is normal and is not a sufficient reason to approve the dispute.

请注意，完成更新后，将无法将店铺本地货币代码切换回 USD ($)。.source_string: Please note that once the update is completed, you will not be able to switch your store’s Local Currency Code back to USD ($).

请注意，对于从中国大陆发货的订单，商户可以使用 WishPost 中的 HS 编.source_string: Note that merchants shipping orders from Mainland China may use the HS Code search tool in WishPost to search for relevant Customs HS Codes by entering the product name. [Learn more]({%1=Example: https://www.wishpost.cn/home/#/})

请注意，所在地国家/地区不同于居住国或国籍国。 {%1=Learn More Z.source_string: Please note that your country of domicile is distinct from your country of residence or country of citizenship. {%1=Learn More Zendesk}

请注意，所有订单（包括 Wish Express 订单）均受“5.5 延时确认履.source_string: Note that all orders, including Wish Express ones, are also subject to Late Confirmed Fulfillment Policy 5.5, which states that "if an order is not confirmed shipped by the carrier within 168 hours of the time the order is released, then the merchant will be penalized {%1=Example: 20%} of the order value, or {%2=Format Currency}, whichever is greater." This policy is only applicable to confirmed fulfilled orders where the merchant price per item plus the shipping price per item is less than {%3=Format Currency}. However, if a Wish Express order is confirmed delivered by the carrier within the required arrival time frame, the penalty will be reversed.

请注意，本条款可能不适用，尤其是在没有集体或联合诉讼选择的欧盟或英国司法管辖区。.source_string: Please note that this clause may not be applicable, especially in European Union or the United Kingdom jurisdictions that do not have class or consolidated action options.

请注意，第 7 段包含仲裁和放弃集体诉讼条款。 您同意本文条款，即表示您同意通过.source_string: Please note that Paragraph 7, contains an arbitration clause and class action waiver. By agreeing to the Terms, you agree to resolve all disputes through binding individual arbitration, which means that you waive any right to have those disputes decided by a judge or jury, and that you waive your right to participate in class actions, class arbitrations, or representative actions. Please read Paragraph 7 carefully.

请注意，若要参与 FBS 项目，商户需要将其库存运送至任一 Fulfillmen.source_string: Note that, to participate in FBS, merchants need to ship their inventory to one of the Fulfillment By Wish (FBW) warehouses.

通信状态.context: CORRESPONDENCE STATUS BETWEEN ADMIN AND MERCHANT

通常，我们收集、使用和存储（统称为“处理”）您的信息，以提供服务、修复和改善服务.source_string: In general, we collect, use, and store ("process") your information to provide the Services, to fix and improve the Services, to develop new services, and to market our companies and their products and services. Some specific examples of how we use information are:

通知受影响的卖家、商户和/或用户.source_string: Notifying impacted sellers, Merchants, and/or customers

通过 Wish Express 为 Wish 用户提供快捷的配送服务，并获得更多.source_string: Offer fast shipping to customers and gain more exposure on Wish with the new Wish Express shipping feature

通过 Wish Express，我们不仅可以展示和宣传我们的快速配送，还可以触达.source_string: Through Wish Express, not only can we present and promote our fast delivery, but also reaches a wider customer base who counts on the reliability and guarantee of Wish Express.

通过 Wish Parcel 对此订单发货.source_string: Leverage Wish Parcel to ship this order

通过 Wish 服务或在与之有关的情况下销售上架产品而从 Wish 收到付款的商.source_string: Merchants that receive payment from Wish as a result of listing items through or in connection with the Wish Services hereby appoint Wish as the merchants’ payment collection agent solely for the limited purpose of accepting funds from Wish users who purchase items through the Wish Services.

通过{%1=Selected Merchant App Name}设置账户并授权.source_string: Once you have set up your account with {%1=Selected Merchant App Name} and authorized them with Wish, click confirm to finish identifying your store.

通过“运费计算”项目，Wish 可以根据产品重量自动计算订单运往 A+ 物流计划.source_string: Calculated Shipping allows Wish to automatically calculate the shipping cost based on the weight of items in an order headed to countries supported by the Advanced Logistics Program. Simply provide the package weight for your product, and we’ll handle the rest. [Learn more]({%1=Url Placeholder}).

通过上传从 Shopify 导出的产品文件来添加产品。.source_string: Add new products by uploading the product export from your Shopify store.

通过任何方式“爬取”、“抓取”或“提取”服务的或与之相关的任何页面、数据或部分；.source_string: “Crawl,” “scrape,” or “spider” any page, data, or portion of or relating to the Services through any means;

通过受信任的合作方来识别您的店铺。.source_string: Identify your store with one of our trusted partners.

通过受信任的支付服务商来识别您的店铺。.source_string: Identify your store with one of the trusted payment service providers.

通过商户平台或 API 上传产品时，您可以提供产品的海关 HS 编码。如果您未在.source_string: You may provide each product's Customs HS Code when uploading the product via Merchant Dashboard or API. If you did not provide a Customs HS Code when uploading this product, no information will be shown here. As such, please provide your Customs HS Code directly to the shipping carrier offline to avoid customs delay or other issues. [Learn more]({%1=Example: http://www.wcoomd.org/en/topics})

通过在线下店内预留库存，FBS 会在全球{%1=Example: **1,000.source_string: By stocking inventory in-store, FBS showcases your products in {%1=Example: **1,000+**} stores across the world and helps you expand your offline customer base.

通过展示其他人如何穿着或使用您的产品，增强用户对产品的信心。直观的视频展示让用户.source_string: Boost buyer confidence by showing someone wearing or using your product. Demo videos allow customers to envision using it themselves by presenting product in a straightforward video format. **Do not include** embedded text, graphic overlays, or animated effects.

通过演示风格的视频讲述产品的故事。视频将静音播放，因此重点要让产品生动起来！为了.source_string: Tell your product’s story through a demo-style video. The video will be soundless, so focus on bringing the product to life! For best results, make sure your video has following attributes and complies with our content rules. [View video content policy]({%1=Video Content Policy Link})

通过热线举报会触发法律或政府方面的举措吗？.source_string: Could a report to the hotline trigger any legal or government action?

通过等级1或等级2的物流服务商进行配送，以获得更快的放款资格。.source_string: Use Tier 1 or 2 carriers for faster payment eligibility!

通过视频展示产品价值，在 Wish 上获得更多曝光量。.source_string: Express your product value in video for extra exposure on Wish.

通过视频让用户更全面地了解您的产品。.source_string: Use video to facilitate universal understanding of your products.

附录：商户从 A+ 物流计划移除的订单可从位于中国大陆以外地区的仓库直接发货，但.source_string: Addendum: Advanced Logistics Program orders that are removed by merchants from the program and allowed to be shipped from warehouses outside of Mainland China must be fulfilled with a [Qualified Confirmed Delivery Shipping Carrier]({%1=Example: /documentation/v2/qualifiedcarr}).

附录：商户只能基于此政策所述理由移除 A+ 物流计划订单。.source_string: Addendum: Merchants may only remove an Advanced Logistics Program order from the program for one of the reasons stated within this policy.

附录：商户只能基于符合规定的理由移除 A+ 物流计划订单。 若发现商户基于不符合.source_string: Addendum: Merchants may only remove an Advanced Logistics Program order from the program for one of the qualified reasons. Repeated violations of this policy may be subject to further penalties such as account suspension.

附录：自 UTC 时间2018年8月15日0时起，对于每个自动退款订单，商户将被.source_string: Addendum: Effective August 15, 2018 00:00 UTC, the merchant will also be penalized {%1=Format Currency}* per auto-refunded order in this case.

附录：自 UTC 时间2019年3月20日0时起，如果发现产品变体具有误导性，该.source_string: Addendum: Effective March 20, 2019 00:00 UTC, if a product variation is detected to be misleading, the variation will be removed from the product, and the merchant will be penalized {%1=Format Currency}* per misleading variation order and {%2=A number, e.g. 100}% of the order value for orders placed in the last {%3=A number, e.g. 30} days from when the particular product variation was detected as misleading, with a minimum penalty of {%4=Format Currency}* per detected misleading product variation.

附录：自2019年7月23日起，如果商户因任何原因更新物流单号，赔款将不予撤销。.source_string: Addendum: Effective July 23, 2019, the penalty will not be reversed if the merchant updates the tracking number for any reason.

附录：自北京时间2019年11月6日0时起，商户可以对附加费用进行申诉，但只能通.source_string: Addendum: Effective November 6, 2019 00:00 Beijing Time, merchants may dispute the additional fee only via the EPC Dispute Tool within their WishPost account.

附录：自太平洋时间2018年10月31日下午5时起，商户可在赔款声明发布后的{%.source_string: Addendum: Effective October 31, 2018 5PM Pacific Time, merchants are allowed to dispute these penalties within {%1=A number, e.g. 3} business days after a penalty statement is generated.

附录：自太平洋时间2019年8月6日晚8时起，在对产品进行仿品或侵犯知识产权审核.source_string: Addendum: Effective August 6, 2019 8PM Pacific Time, upon review for counterfeit and intellectual property infringement, if a product is found to violate Wish's policy, it will be removed and all payments will be withheld, and the merchant may be penalized up to {%1=Format Currency}* per counterfeit product.

附录：自太平洋时间2019年8月6日晚8时起，如果产品被发现违反 Wish 的禁.source_string: Addendum: Effective August 6, 2019 8PM Pacific Time, if a product listing is detected to not comply with Wish’s prohibited product listing policies, the merchant will be penalized up to {%1=Format Currency}* and the product listing will be taken down.

附录：自太平洋时间2019年8月6日晚8时起，如果商户将产品详情页篡改为不同的产.source_string: Addendum: Effective August 6, 2019 8PM Pacific Time, if a merchant changes a product listing into a new product, the product will be removed, the account will be penalized up to {%1=Format Currency}*, and the account will be at risk of suspension.

附录：自太平洋时间2019年8月6日晚8时起，如果店铺下架或移除过去{%2=A.source_string: Addendum: Effective August 6, 2019 8PM Pacific Time, if a store disables or removes a promoted product with {%1=Format Currency}+ GMV* in the last {%2=A number, e.g. 9} days, or if a store disables a specific country for a promoted product with {%3=Format Currency}+ GMV* in the last {%4=A number, e.g. 9} days in that country, the store will be penalized {%5=Format Currency}*.

附录：自太平洋时间2019年8月6日晚上8时起，若发现订单受评论和/评分操控行为.source_string: Addendum: Effective August 6, 2019 8PM Pacific Time, orders that are found to have been affected by manipulated reviews and/or ratings are subject to be penalized up to {%1=Format Currency}* per affected order.
